story:
At Streetforce Youth Centre we have been running programs for inner-city youth for over a decade. We have a strong track record creating and running programming that both empowers and benefits the youth here in the inner-city.In Saskatoon’s core neighbourhoods, many youth face the pressures of crime, the reality of addictions and poverty that are prevelant in the neighbourhoods where they grow up.


Most of the youth who come through our youth centre come from a First Nation background. Over the years we have seen first hand how many of the youth growing up in the inner-city face a harder time getting into the workforce. This can be as simple as youth in the inner-city often have a harder time getting that first summer job at 15 or 16 years old, then youth from other backgrounds.


We feel that often there is a variety factors to the barriers these youth face. Sometimes they don’t have the same family or community supports that other kids have. Their parents were never able to model work for them, or help them figure out how to successfully apply for even a basic retail job. Other times lack of transportation can be a real barrier. Youth in families who cannot afford a vehicle, successfully apply for jobs, then find they are unable to keep the job when they can’t obtain consistent transportation. Finally, I have seen far to many times where managers will not even consider a job application from a youth from a First Nation background. Due to prejudice, many of the youth are not even considered for a call-back when they hand in a job application. I have helped far to many youth fill out dozens of applications, only to be really disappointed when they did not get even one call-back.


This summer at StreetForce we are working to launch The Scoop Ice Cream Shop, right on 20th Street, a couple blocks down from our youth centre! This ice cream shop will employ inner-city (and primarily First Nation youth). Our goal is to create a sustainable business model that will allow us to employ 8 - 10 youth who would benefit from an opportunity to have a summer job.


We believe we have a sustainable business model! And we have coupled it with some of the mentoring-relationship programs that we have already developed! This will afford these First Nation youth and opportunity to get invaluable work experience at a first-time summer job. We will also work closely with the youth to help them overcome many of the barriers listed above. It is our hope, that these youth will gain the training and experience to then successfully get work elsewhere once the summer is over! They will then have something on their resume to help them get an after-school job, or wait and successfully apply somewhere else the following summer!


We have have been given permission to build this ice cream “shack” on the parking-lot located at 20th and Ave B. However we are looking to raise funding to cover both the start-up costs and the costs of the mentoring facet of this youth-employment-program.


We want to raise 4500.00 to the costs of construction. If you wish, we are more than willing to provide a breakdown of the construction and equipment expenses. Please consider giving what you can! If there are other individuals who you know who would consider making a donation that would be a very real investment in the life of a youth, please pass this champaign along to them as well!


Every gift, no matter the size makes a difference! And we strongly believe this will go a long way to empowering these youth to reach their potential!


Chris Randall.

Director, StreetForce Youth Centre

story:
The new campaign is on line HERE!!!

 

Let the vision take control!


"Share Zero Space is the new and revolutionary technology allow you to be protagonist in the; all over the world, event control!"


I'm Mario, from Italy. I'm an entrepreneur and an inventor involved in technology since 80' and also CEO of my companies Project Studio and Computer Design. I would like to change the way to approach solutions using a smart point of view.

After many patents and time spent to understand what is really important and what we really need from technology I understood that the best thing we need is a smart tech  that permit to us to reach ubiquity. Imagine how cool it will be when you will be able to control any event you care for in the real world, from every place, by simply accessing a special cloud space and immediately interacting with that event! It will be Awesome!

This idea jumps over all limits if I introduce a least but not last concept. I am not alone!. We are not alone!. Maybe we have a family or maybe we have friends and we want, or simply we need to share or delegate with them this control .

The question becomes hard. What it is sure is that we don’t want to become an engineer or a tech specialist to realize this dream, and above all,  we do not want to spend time and money for it.

We simply need to improve our life quality, saving time, simply acting, controlling, sharing and delegating actions from any place without moving, simply using the network.

This was my staring point, this was the seed of ShareZeroSpace technology, now developed into a tree.

                                                       (Photo of SZS core board)
 

This board is the smart hardware core of SZS technology. This is the connector of real events to the SZS cloud. Since the internet network is now spread all over in the world (fixed or mobile) and it does not discriminate on speed or nations, once you have connected the SZS device to internet you have the full control of any event to which this device is locally connected.

And this is the simpliest device with SZS technology inside that allow to transform a normal power-stripe to a smart 4 socket power-stripe.

    (This SZS smart 4 socket power stripe used in demo is also available as a perk!)

Using the cloud portal and a super-simple multilanguages graphic user interface, on tablet, mobile smartphone or PC's, you can interact with the event, fully freeing the power of Share Zero Space vision.


               (Here pictured a space zone of user account. This is the place for

                               controlling event also with a webcam vision)


How does it works?

Now let me explain how the system works. You only need to have at least one ShareZeroSpace device composed by a standard core board + a standard multi purposes shield or a specialized functions shield.

       (Photo of SZS core board connected + multi pourposes shield on bottom)


You need then to connect the device to the internet network from one side and to the event you need to control on the other. The controlled events may for example be related to electrical motor driven gates, light or light systems, socket or socket stripes, irrigation systems, electrical locks, heating or cooling systems. Or they may consist in events that you need to supervise, such as access to controlled doors, water level controls, power or water metering systems or whatever else is furnished of  an input or output dialogue. The example below shows the capabilities of core SZS board + multi purposes in/out/temp shield.

This stage will require in most cases ten minutes of work by a non super-tech user, may be you or your electrician, or zero minutes by buying a ready to use device, such the power strip exhibit on demo.


                                            ( SZS in all-weather case with dimension)

Then you need to register your new ShareZeroSpace device on the cloud, and, after a ultra simple localized language configuration, all is done.


No specialized devices, no apps, no software, no servers, no long time learning curve. By means of any kind of internet connected device, such as mobile phones, tablets, PC’s, internet totems, etc., you can access your ShareZeroSpace zone using your personal account.

Immediately, you be able to operate on your controlled event through a simple and powerful graphic interface.

You can have multiple ShareZeroSpace devices connected and joined to your account in multiple place all over the world. Awesome superpower!.

But, if you remember, we said, we are not alone. So we introduce the opportunity, with no complications, with no overwork, with no wast of time, to share every single controlled event with others, to delegate and allow others to control atspecfied times signle event connected to the ShareZeroSpace device.

The friend or delegate will be authorized and alerted with a mail that includes the appropriate information. From this point on, your friend can interact with event, and you, if you desire, will be warned anytime. The cool side is that your shared-event friends, in their ZSZ zone on their accounts, can find and use the shared event. When you desire to stop the sharing, with a simple action you can cancel it.

Finally you can also be warned if something has changed by e-mail ( we plan in the future to integrate a sms alert function) if someting event  has changed status, like a opened SZS controlled door or a electric motor failure when SZS will be adopted for check power overcharge.

Since also other people may have an account and multiple SZS device under their control, also they can share with you the control of events. It's like a social network of things, instead of a social network of words.

You can do what you want no matter of community (share), no matter of time (zero), no matter of distance (space). We are designing a special functionality that permits in the future the release of software to share and interact with SZS technology directly by common socials network.

The vision emerging from ShareZeroSpace is that with zero time (without waiting) and zero space (without moving) we can interact with real world events, sharing the resource. That's all.

Simple, sure, instantly and primarily all, smart!.

If you help us joining this campaign, we help you not only to enjoy of this smart solution, but we together can really change our way to enjoy life and have more free time and fun!.

Together we can make the difference from suffer the technology to steer technology!

We make the cloud version running well, and you can verify this by connecting to sharezerospace using the credential: e-mail: demo password: 12345. Once you logged in, then click on Zone and then click icon "control" on rigth side of lava lamp row. Please note, in this demo,  user account data is locked for avoiding undesidered user data changement.

At this point you can locate the lamp status indicator and the command icon where, by clicking, you can control the switching of lamp. You also can use a web cam icon, by clicking it and, after you inserted the camera account (user:user, password:user), direct live video will appear on the screen, showing what happens to the lamp at the moment. You can find all the instructions about demo features and vision, in the document    "Thechnology that we really need" .


By reading it, you can run and enjoy demos, and undestand exactly what happen while you control a lava lamp attached to a power stripe (with szs core smart device + a special shield inside) on our office with online web camera view . Yes!!!!, SZS allow users to associate a web camera for every connected event and more other feature, including a special function involving QR code for special speed access mode if your mobile device such smartphone is equipped with a camera and QR reading software.

             (photo of demo place, powerstrip + lava lamp connected on socket #1)


What We Need & What You Get

We have built hardware and software prototype almost ready for production, complete with a smart all-weather case.

                             ShareZeroSpace device on all-weather case.

           (on left SZS single component and on the rigth SZS ready to ship)

A milestone has been accomplished and a device is ready for production, but more work is needed to make it a ready to market product. This must be equipped with multiple solutions like ready to use power stripe, ready to use irrigation system, possibility of micro cloud applications, and must also include other friendly features in software and an ultra-modern skin. So we need founding and we hope to rise at least $ 70.000 for developing all options we have in mind.

What we do with your donation if we reach the goal.


Why we decide for $70.000? Our woking plan, if we reach the goal with your help include this task:

- We plan to design, using the same easiness of use, a better cloud site, also                designed for auto-adapting for all mobile platform such smartphone and tablet and a free downloadable all server platform micro SZS cloud software.

- We want improve languages localization for a better share experience with other people.

- We plan to realize a stylish design case for SZS device, also for accessories.

- We plan to realize a single plug and play SZS smart socket for every use, for share and control any type of socket appliance at home like: microwave oven, electric heater (also using included temperature control), etc.

- We plan to realize a single plung and play SZS input control for every use, like infra-red  sensor for alarm and for presence (child and pet applications), etc.
 
- We plan to develop battery operated mobile device for mobile lock systems, including GPS active localization, for automotive use and social mobile share like car and cicle pooling, etc.

- We want to promote the use of this tecnology in city council for adopting in public lighting system (for energy saving and on demand use),  water leakege preventing systems, etc.

- We had designed and we plan to develop a new cheap environment monitoring  sensors systems for take care of our planet. We use this tecnology for deploy the our patens in multiple branch of technology. Parking and logistic, environment (smart sensor for monitoring and forewarn; fire, flooding, hurricanes, pollution) ,  personal security, etc. (if you are intereste on our patent  search Mario Puppo as inventor in EPO database).

- We plan to extend the SZS patent we made all over the world

Budget will be assigned in this way:

$ 30.000  allocated for develop and improve new software functions
$ 25.000  allocated for design case, accessories, and mobile SZS device
$ 10.000  allocated for servers farm (we want the use of SZS cloud be free forever)
$ 5.000    allocated for environment protection and control device

We worked hard since more than one year for present you this challenge. It's real, and you can direcly try with the demo. But with your help as we had explain, we can finally complete what we have in mind and what we have included in our working plan here described.

What you get


If you will be a part of this evolution being an early adopter of this technology and of this new vision, you will be a part of a new way of thinking globally, but actually you can immediately enjoy the perks derived by the adoption of ShareZeroSpace model.

If you decide to partecipate to this campaign, even also with a litte donation, we will hear you on all of your suggest for improve SZS technology

In return, depending on what perks you choose, you may get the coolest ShareZeroSpace device fully functional  also in a smart all-weather case with full of documentation and you are free to use the SZS cloud. There will be, based on SZS device, a series of accessories that permit the connection of the device to the network using IP over power, WiFi and 3G for mobile use, and an efficient localization of it with active GPS. If you are a developer or simply you want to adopt this technology on your website or on your own developed cloud application, join the developers program by choosign perks including SDK or SZS SDK+ SZS Cloud source software, to have complete access to software and hardware resources.


                 Future version of ShareZeroSpace device on all-weather case .
  (SZS equipped with IP over power on the left and equipped with WiFi on the rigth)


If you are experienced developer  and if you want to develop shield yourself, base developing device is also available consisting of a core SZS smart device + software and hardware resources. This will let you do develop your personal type of device based on SZS technology and start to create your micro-cloud SZS for your need our for your markets.

Due to many request we receive after this campaign was started, we also decide to dovelop and propose (included in perks) a stand alone SZS cloud server for anyone want to create personal and private SZS cloud server. (read Q&A and also Update)

Your found will be used for this, only for this!. So, please hep us, donate or  join  perks and enjoy about this unique possibilities.
Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no surprises at all.

The Impact

We are a small company and without you, we cannot free the complete power of SZS tech. We want to continue to work on these technology because we trust on it. We have adopted it as first user, daily, and we are sure it will give you the benefits you are searching for.

Without your contributions, we cannot afford to pay  for manufacturing the of the ready to market products and for improving  the cloud software platform, so please donate!  With your help, we can bring Share Zero Space technology into the world and your make more and more simple saving time,  sharing opportunities and be more happy.

We trust that toegether we can deliver the most disruptive and revolutionary tech of new millenium!.

Risks & Challenges

The major risk, for you and us together, is to loose an opportunity. Losing this challenge means loosing the opportunities to finally have technology that we really need, that we really want.

The dream of a real world connected as described above is one step from reality. Daily we use the SZS technology and the prototypes. We will be happy to share with the world our daily personal experience.

We worked hard for doing what we offer to you today. Give power to this real opportunity, join us and claim your perks.   

Our family, our friends, from now enjoy of this happiness, now it's your time.


Shiping cost of pledge

We are able to ship your pledged materials all over the world. We do not want to overcharge shipping cost, so you can pay the shipping cost exactly for destination.
So you need to add shipping cost to the pledge you choose.

We have negotiate shipping cost for all over the world cost, They are:

Europe and Middle East                |         $ 20
Americas                                          |         $ 30
Asia  and Oceania                           |         $ 40

This includes standard international post shipping. If you need or you want to use international express shipping, pease let us to know and we arrange the best shippig cost for sending goods with DHL, UPS, FedEx.

Please Note:

Shipping cost do no apply to perks regarding stikers. In this case shipping cost are included.

Perks over 230 $ are shipped all over the world without shipping cost!
 

  • our shipping rates do not include any taxes or charges you may incur on arrival in your country.

  • combined shipping, at this time we do not have any price estimates for combined shipping, currently it is more cost effective to send each product individually and we are still working with DHL to get better rates ASAP.

HOW TO: Shipping For New Pledges (e.g. if you are in the U.S.A.)
  1. Choose the Perk you want to pledge / purchase, e.g. "All weather SZS"
  2. Check our Shipping cost of pledge for costs to your country for your Perks
  3. Add Additional Gift > Custom amount below e.g. $30 for USA

In every case of doubt, feel freeto  contact us. We enjoy to help you.


Other Ways You Can Help

We are happy of what you can do! In every case if you like our vision and our concrete solutions, please share with others, no matter if are friends or not, the awesome ShareZeroSpace challenge. Share is a big part of vision, because in every case, 1+1 is more than two.

So, invite, let others to know this opportunities, and finally, if this challenge will be accomplished, even you, can enjoy about the success,  maybe using your personal ShareZeroSpace device or any event shared with you by your friends or your company.


Questions and Answers (Q&A)

Q: I like solutions offered by SZS but what's about the question I want make a private cloud running only on my private network.

A: Hi funder. No problem, if you buy a micro-cloud server running SZS you can create your personal and even private SZS cloud. This mean you can put it in you private network and running it by controlling and sharing event like the world wide cloud on your private network.
If you connect it to the internet (e.g. by your home adsl or wan) this will spread all over the world, and you can reach from any place, but remain your provate SZS cloud 

Q: After buy a SZS device, how I need to do for connect it to SZS cloud for control and share event connected to my SZS device

A: What is needed is simply input the unicode serial string (proviced with yout SZS device) in the page "Device" after clicking add device. After this operation,you can assign descriptive names to your events and after configuring Ip address of yor network all is done. From now you'll find all event in your "Zone" page.  You can from now; control, share and delegate any event. SZS Cloud allow you can do everythings  from any device connected to the internet all over the world.

Q: Why you think the product also without case?

A: Because we consider the owner want to embed the SZS device in their appliance instead of place another case. However, we design the all-weather case for everytype of installation, inside and outside. In the future we plan to have a case for inside with better design.

Q: How long takes to electrically connect SZS device to an event?

A: Depend on event. In most case, like the electric gate, the irrigations system, the garden lights, etc. is a question of minutes. Consider that digital output o SZS device consist in a relay with open-common-close contact. It's like to connect a standard switch. 

Q: Can I use SZS device like a smart house bus component?

A: Yes, the SZS device can work like a smart house bus component. Configuring it with function "digital input act on related digital output"  and all is done. Locally you'll connect the wall switch to digital input and the related digital output (relay) will work like a switch. From this point you can locally switching the charge (eg.lamp) with your old wall switch and remotely you can use SZS cloud  in your account for control the switch event. The output can work like a two state switch (open/close) or if you want like a push button with desidered hold time (programmable). The power stripe output wokr like this. Remotely you can control related output socket and locally the same using the small red button (see socket stripe demo's photo). Feedback on SZS cloud is always the true state of input or output.  

Q: What type of internet connection need SZS device

A: SZS device work with all type of internet connection from super slow 33.6K, to a fast 100M fiber optic. Every type such fixed ADSL, WAN, HDSL work well and for mobile applications GPRS, 3G, 4G are suitable.
Traffic from SZS clousd and SZS device use a very small bandwith and the footrprint of SZS on your network is very small.

Q: What about SZS device in mobile use

A: SZS device work perfecty in mobile use. The device can work with a low power supply (9-12 VDC@ 0.6A max with all relay engaged) and is suitable to work with battery operated or with energy saving system such battery and solar pannel. Communication with internet can be realized using a GPRS, 3G or 4G connection. If SZS device is equipped with a WiFi expansion, it can operate also using smartphone or portable router. This means you can use for eg. for control door car opening or anti theft solution for cutting fuel simply stopping electric fuel car pump.

will be accomplished, even you, can enjoy about the success,  maybe using your personal ShareZeroSpace device or any event shared with you by your friends or your company.Questions and Answers (Q&A)Q: I like solutions offered by SZS but what's about the question I want make a private cloud running only on my private network.A: Hi funder. No problem, if you buy a micro-cloud server running SZS you can create your personal and even private SZS cloud. This mean you can put it in you private network and running it by controlling and sharing event like the world wide cloud on your private network. If you connect it to the internet (e.g. by your home adsl or wan) this will spread all over the world, and you can reach from any place, but remain your provate SZS cloud Q: After buy a SZS device, how I need to do for connect it to SZS cloud for control and share event connected to my SZS deviceA: What is needed is simply input the unicode serial string (proviced with yout SZS device) in the page "Device" after clicking add device. After this operation,you can assign descriptive names to your events and after configuring Ip address of yor network all is done. From now you'll find all event in your "Zone" page.  You can from now; control, share and delegate any event. SZS Cloud allow you can do everythings  from any device connected to the internet all over the world. Q: Why you think the product also without case?A: Because we consider the owner want to embed the SZS device in their appliance instead of place another case. However, we design the all-weather case for everytype of installation, inside and outside. In the future we plan to have a case for inside with better design.Q: How long takes to electrically connect SZS device to an event?A: Depend on event. In most case, like the electric gate, the irrigations system, the garden lights, etc. is a question of minutes. Consider that digital output o SZS device consist in a relay with open-common-close contact. It's like to connect a standard switch. Q: Can I use SZS device like a smart house bus component?A: Yes, the SZS device can work like a smart house bus component. Configuring it with function "digital input act on related digital output"  and all is done. Locally you'll connect the wall switch to digital input and the related digital output (relay) will work like a switch. From this point you can locally switching the charge (eg.lamp) with your old wall switch and remotely you can use SZS cloud  in your account for control the switch event. The output can work like a two state switch (open/close) or if you want like a push button with desidered hold time (programmable). The power stripe output wokr like this. Remotely you can control related output socket and locally the same using the small red button (see socket stripe demo's photo). Feedback on SZS cloud is always the true state of input or output.  Q: What type of internet connection need SZS deviceA: SZS device work with all type of internet connection from super slow 33.6K, to a fast 100M fiber optic. Every type such fixed ADSL, WAN, HDSL work well and for mobile applications GPRS, 3G, 4G are suitable. Traffic from SZS clousd and SZS device use a very small bandwith and the footrprint of SZS on your network is very small.Q: What about SZS device in mobile useA: SZS device work perfecty in mobile use. The device can work with a low power supply (9-12 VDC@ 0.6A max with all relay engaged) and is suitable to work with battery operated or with energy saving system such battery and solar pannel. Communication with internet can be realized using a GPRS, 3G or 4G connection. If SZS device is equipped with a WiFi expansion, it can operate also using smartphone or portable router. This means you can use for eg. for control door car opening or anti theft solution for cutting fuel simply stopping electric fuel car pump.

story:
Don’t paint your grass green! The Garden Hippo keeps your grass green irrespective of water shortage, drought and hosepipe bans.

No more throwing washing-up water on your lawn. No need to syphon the bath water on to the flower bed. Stop standing in a plastic trug whilst having a shower then carrying it to the garden.

The Garden Hippo collects waste water from the bath/shower and kitchen/utility mixes it with rainwater then pumps the water with its own internal pump, giving 5 litres per minute to water the garden.

The Garden Hippo, easy to install, simple to use gives you a constant supply of water for the garden. It even gives choices about which water you collect and when.

The Garden Hippo is more than a water butt. It is a complete water recycling system for the garden.

The Garden Hippo is part of the solution to helping people be more water efficient by re-using the waste water. It allows the gardener to have choices about which source of water is being collected depending on time of year and weather conditions.  Easy to fit and simple to use and the householder can still enjoy their garden.

Using the Garden Hippo allows 20,000 litres of water to be re-used over the growing season, may be more depending on the household.

Some Water companies give a 10% discount on water bills to households recycling water.

The Garden Hippo pays for itself within 3 years.

What you get:

·Tank 1202 mm long x 646 mm wide x 826 mm high with lockable lid

· Capacity to overflow 300 litres 

· 3 P Technik Rain Water Diverter

· Connectors

· 2 internal filters

· 2 internal diverter valves

· Pump 350 watts: 1 bar/m delivery head

· Designed to 5 litres per minute flow rate

· Electrical cable length 10m

· 30m Ultimate hose, nozzle and hose cart

· 500ml Garden friendly biocide


Now that productions is here we need the £50,000 to develop our production, sales and website.

Cascade Water Products wants to help the world be more water efficient.

Be a hero - use it twice!

Be a hero - Be part of the solution! Support our campaign either by donating or purchasing a Garden Hippo.

Your help is much appreciated. Thank you

story:
Be part of our community - Together we create jobs

“iGio Connect” is an iOS mobile platform designed to instantly connect two parties seeking or requiring jobs of any size. No matter where you are, you can always find instant help and offer jobs and get immediate connection with local people. 

Jobs - no matter how big or small, far or wide, "iGio Connect" allows people to sell their skills and expertise for all kinds of requirements.

Many elderly are being left behind these days, imagine if they can find help and assistance in their neighborhood with just one tap on their phone i.e. find urgent help when their children are not around anymore, find someone to take them to hospital, to buy medicine, for translation, to fix the paperwork, to help gardening or any urgent issues that they can't handle.


Time and cash are needed to run and keep this smart and useful application running and working

iGio Connect is available on Appstore and it's completely free to use and download. The iOS application is a beta version so there is still long way to go. I need to develop and run this application and keep it updated regularly. The more people using this application the more useful it will become. It's important to make people and the community aware of this smart and powerful application and to promote using it. Time and cash are needed to keep iGio Connect running and working. Alone I'm not strong, I need to build a team to work with me. Hopefully this campaign will help me make my dream come true. 

Story behind iGio Connect

My name is Nicole Tran, 1'm a system developer. It’s been 2 years now since my father had a stroke - a disease that affects the arteries leading to and within the brain, which can cause disability and death.

15 years of studying and working away from home, I returned from far away to visit my father and found him on the floor unconscious at home. He was 64. I desperately called for an ambulance and got my father to the hospital.

Your father was very lucky that you found him just on time, said the doctor. One or two minutes late to find someone with a stroke can cause life and death.

My father's left side and eye were paralysed as a result of the stroke. He stayed in the hospital for first two and half months. He needed to be looked after during his recovery and after being discharged from hospital so I quit my job, left my life behind and moved back home to take care of my father.

During the two years of taking care of my father, giving him everyday assistance, taking him for regular hospital visits and constant physical and medical treatments, I found time to develop a mobile application "iGio Connect". I hope that everyone out there will find instant help and assistance whenever and wherever they need. Just as much as I and my father need it. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any contribution would be appreciated,  please share this campaign or tell your friends and family about this smart and very useful application. We need more people to use it and make it useful for the community and everyone. Thank you!

story: Simple: There are not nearly sufficient neighbourhood pubs out there. Instead, today's modern world has been taken over by your global franchises. In all honesty: wouldn't you rather want to hang out in a friendly place, where people recognize you, greet you by your name, and ask you if you'll be having 'the usual' - or, better yet, the bartender serves you your favourite drink before you even take your seat?
story_txt: Simple: There are not nearly sufficient neighbourhood pubs out there. Instead, today's modern world has been taken over by your global franchises. In all honesty: wouldn't you rather want to hang out in a friendly place, where people recognize you, greet you by your name, and ask you if you'll be having 'the usual' - or, better yet, the bartender serves you your favourite drink before you even take your seat?

story:
THANK YOU SO MUCH TO EVERYONE THAT DONATED. WE WILL BE IN CONTACT SOON TO GET YOU YOUR PERKS!! THANKS!

I Built a Bookshop is a project to develop a brand new independent, community-involved bookshop in La Grange, Illinois. There’s a range one-of-a-kind donation perks for you to choose from, with all proceeds going toward building the new store.

Anderson’s Bookshop is a 6th generation family owned business in the Chicago area and this year we celebrated our 50th year! Our history dates back to 1875 when our great-great grandfather opened a Pharmacy in Naperville, Illinois and started selling books on the second floor. In 1964 our grandfather opened our first official bookstore above the drugstore, calling it Paperback Paradise. Since then we have moved to a separate location in downtown Naperville and opened a location in Downers Grove and became Anderson's Bookshop. 

Anderson’s Bookshop strives for more than being just a bookstore. We want to share a passion and knowledge of books to create lifelong readers. To provide a place where the exchange of ideas and thoughts have a diverse playing field. To be a destination for our community to keep open the dialogue of free speech and free expression. To be a part of our greater community in support of education. And to be a place of good company, great reads, and engaging conversations for everyone.

In return for your support, you’ll be one of the few to own an exclusive, t-shirt, tote bag or mug with artwork created exclusively for this campaign. All created and designed by a local artist. Or you could choose a “Golden Ticket” that guarantees you autographed books and the first spots in line to meet authors of your choosing!

Show that you helped  build a bookshop with this awesome t-shirt. Featured on the shirt are hints of downtown La Grange, Illinois where we hope to bring a brand new independent bookshop! (designed by a local artist)
You can help us build a bookshop and you will have something awesome to carry your books around in! Featured on the tote bag are two of Anderson's best employees, Hope and George. (designed by a local artist)


At your desk, while reading a book in bed, at the dinner table or while sipping coffee show that YOU helped build a bookshop! Featured on the mug are hints of downtown La Grange, Illinois where we hope to bring a brand new independent bookshop! (designed by a local artist)
Your "Golden Ticket" makes you a VIP at any Anderson's event! This ticket allows you to pick from any of the amazing authors coming to Anderson's Bookshop and receive an autographed copy of the author's latest book and one of the first spots in line to meet the author!!! This is a booklover's dream! Also, the perfect gift for the booklover or family of booklovers in your life.



No way. It’s just a fraction of what we need to build a new independent bookshop. We’re putting up the bulk of the funding from our own resources. The $50K we hope to raise with this project will bring us the rest of the funding needed to build the new store, get the shelves built and stocked, and start bringing authors and events to our new community. We look forward to reaching and even surpassing our goal with your support. 

We also have plans for some “stretch goals” that will help us go beyond the $50K mark. We’ll post those goals here soon.



For years we have been approached from all over the Chicago area to open a new bookshop and we feel La Grange will be a great fit for us. La Grange is a strong, vibrant and creative community that deserves a great bookshop. Bookstores are a place of community, ideas and a home for everyone that has ever loved to read and share stories. By contributing to our Indiegogo project, you can help us build that home!



All our perks are designed and produced locally. We hope you want to show your love of independent bookshops and let the world know you helped build one!  We strongly believe in supporting local businesses, and we know you do, too. When you back our project, you’re purchasing some pretty cool things but you are also putting money back into your community. All funds raised through this project will be used to get our new bookshop up and running and start serving our community. 

Thank you for backing this project. Anderson’s Bookshop has been in communities for over 50 years and we wouldn’t be here without you. We want to build a place for passionate people to be passionate about what they love in another great community. Thank you for building a bookshop!



• When will I get my cool stuff?

Our fundraising campaign ends on August 8th. Should our project successfully meet its $50K goal, we will begin production immediately afterward. We anticipate that products will be available in September 2015.

• Can I pick up my stuff at Anderson’s Bookshop?

Yes, products (i.e., perks) will be available for in-store pickup at the Anderson’s Bookshop Naperville or Downers Grove location after production is complete. You will receive an email alerting you when your perks are ready for pickup. We anticipate availability in September 2015. If you do not want to pick up your perks in-store we’ll be glad to ship them to you. You can tell us which option you prefer (in-store pickup or shipped to your door).

• What if my shirt doesn’t fit. Can I send it back?

Unfortunately, shirts (and other perks) are nonrefundable and no exchanges can be made.

• If I choose a Golden Ticket perk, how do I know which author events I can choose from?

We will contact you after the campaign ends with details on how to select the author events you’d like to attend.

story:
After finally having my website up and running (The Angry Baker Co Website) I need to get the message out and then need to be able to produce and deliver the product.

It is important to realize this campaign is in the "Community" section as opposed to the more obvious "Food" section.  To be sure, the baked goods offered are second to none in quality however, The Angry Baker Co. is so much more than a gourmet baking company that it would be too limiting...almost unfair...to have labeled it just another "Food" enterprise seeking funding.  


The main thrust behind The Angry Baker Co. is creating awareness in our often very busy lives, that there are people you know...often well...who are going through very difficult and challenging times in their own lives.  These challenges are often the source of tremendous stress, anxiety, and outright pain.  While it might seem counterintuitive to send a "gift" usually associated with positive and/or happy moments, how amazing would it be to send a gift tin of cookies to someone going through some tough times simply letting that person know he or she is not alone?! How awesome would it be to send a note of inspiration with that gift in an attempt to lift those spirits if not but for a few precious moments?! How unique would it be to nominate someone you know who performed an extra kind deed for another person where this nominated individual receives a gift tin from The Angry Baker Co. publicly acknowledging that this world would be a better place with more people just like him or her?!  Well, The Angry Baker Co. can make all this happen (please peruse the website) and more!!  The ultimate goal is for these gourmet baked products to serve as a springboard to REALLY helping people through difficult situations in their lives so that sending a gift tin is just the first step in helping someone through these times.  The Angry Baker Co. seeks to raise the consciousness of people all over this great country -- and beyond -- that simple acts of kindness can have a powerful ripple effect in easing someone's pain. As we like to say around the bakery: We are putting smiles on grumpy faces one bite at a time.  

The money being raised will be used for production, advertising, promotion, and packaging to inspire people from coast to coast to use The Angry Baker Co. as a starting point to lend meaningful support to someone going through a challenging life experience of any kind. Reaching the masses is no easy task and requires funding to bring this cause to the forefront.  A brick and mortar location has already been designed (see pictures above) and we hope to have The Angry Baker Co. cafes open all over the country where people can come in to relax and "take a load off" themselves and remind them to "take a load off" for others.

story:
MSS KITS is a recently created UK based engineering technology brand specialising in the development of tailored adjustable performance spring kits primarily aimed at prestige German cars with factory (OE) electronic (active) suspensions - Audi MagneRide™, BMW EDC™, Porsche PASM/S™ and VW ACC/DCC™.


We develop Premium Fully Adjustable Performance Spring systems in partnership with Eibach and key partners. Find below an infographic on the eight key benefits.


We offer four distinctive types of performance spring kits to meet each individual needs, MSS Streets, MSS Sports, MSS Track Pack and MSS 'LS'  explained below.

MSS Streets is our most popular, compliant riding and ideal kit for the daily commute or regular open roads drive as shown in the customer road test video below. The occasional trip to a race circuit can be accomplished competently, which is what our customers tell us. It is a well rounded and well received product.


MSS Sports is our signature product and the most versatile kit we offer. Use for the Monday to Friday commute however, at the weekends, it is the perfect solution for the regular track going sports car. This kit was on our Development car for three years which we constantly evolved to get the product as it stands now. 

MSS Track Pack enables higher speed cornering; later braking; sharper turn-in. This kit enables the chassis to cope well with the challenges a race circuit offers. Don't take our word for it, watch the video below of our test race driver, Nick, lapping cars during this short demo ride given to Tim of SHMEE150...fab!

MSS 'LS' builds on what we have learned from the 3 previous products and delivers a modular track focused kit that is still civilised for streets use. 'LS' is the ideal compliment to our Streets and Sports kits, enabling a quick swap out for track use that takes all of 30-minutes! More details is available on our web site News page.

Feedback on the current product range from customers and showcasing their cars.





Take our front adjustable kit, with patent pending, choose one of our rear adjustable kits to suit and enable all round ride height adjustment on your existing dampers !


Try our Standard Full Kits which ships with a 'one-time' lowered fixed height front spring carefully calibrated to perform seamlessly with our Adjustable Rear Kits.


Each of our Adjustable Rear Kits range are effectively calibrated enabling you to keep the factory (OE) sports front springs or aftermarket lowering front springs.


Patent pending  product, enabling effective ride height adjustment on all VW Audi Group (VAG) car with a McPherson strut - fits any VAG active or passive damper!

We are passionate about each component we design from the ground up with functionality built in to each and made right here, in England.

Take these simple looking patent pending  adjusters, they enable front ride height adjustment on any VW Audi Group (VAG) car. We believe it is our defining product.

We designed a chamfered edge on all our components offering an effective solution for the common issue of springs catching the edge of adjusters.


The MSS KITS Fully Adjustable Suspension System 

Patent Pending  in-house designed Front Adjuster Kit coupled with our signature bespoke triple rated dual stacked  rear arrangement both use premium race technology springs manufactured by Eibach to our exact specifications.

We need to expand our product range to a wider audience to give new customers the opportunity to experience the benefits of MSS Spring Kits. We selected Indiegogo because we believe it to be the right platform with the right people to help us achieve the following goals;
  • Pre-sell new products currently in development which will help with Manufacturing costs.
  • Through the perks offered, it will allows us to share our unique and effective suspension system with more people.
  • With your support we can raise product awareness for new releases planned.









We are a small team of highly skilled individuals enabling us to develop  solutions that enhances the handling and ride comfort of sports cars for everyday use.

Peter - CEO: Has a wealth of business experience including nurturing new start-ups.

Jeff - COO: Fellow car enthusiast, understands the issues our products addresses.

Akin - CFO: Wealth of commercial experience in manufacturing and distribution.

Jim heads development and the first member of my team, having joined in 2010.

Amanda ensures we communicate, effectively, all the benefits of our products.

We have a great team assembled and backed by our manufacturing partnersWilliam | MSS KITS Creator/Owner | william@msskits.com


Below is our planned 2015 products release schedule for VW and Audi cars.

Suspension engineering is complicated because there are vehicle load capability, weight and damper travel tolerances to take in to consideration with any design.

We have 5-years experience in the design and development of our products supported by Eibach, our chosen spring manufacturer with over 60-years spring technology experience. Combined, we have in place well rehearsed processes which has helped mitigate known manufacturing, testing and product launch risks. 

Manufacturing

The quality of our CNC parts have been widely commented on by customers and we are proud to use quality raw material, which cost a little more to produce. We want to continue using quality raw material however it requires money.

Eibach manufacture springs to our exacting specifications from their TUV approved world-class facilities in Germany - used by Formula 1; Indycar; WRC Rally, DTM, MotoGP, Nascar (to name but a few) race teams. We know we have the right spring manufacturer and customer feedback indicates that we have the right choice. 

Development and Testing

Each kit developed goes through a series of tough road and track tests which requires time and money. Our aim is to continue with these thorough processes.
story_txt:
MSS KITS is a recently created UK based engineering technology
brand specialising in the development of tailored adjustable performance spring
kits primarily aimed at prestige German cars with factory (OE) electronic (active)
suspensions - Audi MagneRide™, BMW EDC™, Porsche PASM/S™ and VW ACC/DCC™.







We develop Premium Fully Adjustable Performance Spring systems in
partnership with Eibach and key partners. Find below an infographic on the eight key benefits. 
We offer four distinctive types of performance spring kits to meet each individual needs, MSS Streets, MSS Sports, MSS Track Pack and MSS 'LS'  explained below. 

MSS Streets is our most popular, compliant riding and ideal kit for the
daily commute or regular open roads drive as shown in the customer road test video below. The occasional trip to a race circuit can be accomplished competently, which is what our customers tell us. It is a well rounded and well received product.
MSS Sports is
our signature product and the most versatile kit we offer. Use for the Monday to Friday commute however, at the weekends, it is the perfect solution for the regular track going sports car. This kit was on our Development car for three years which we constantly evolved to get the product as it stands now. 
MSS Track Pack enables higher speed cornering; later braking; sharper turn-in. This kit enables the chassis to cope well with the challenges
a race circuit offers. Don't take our word for it, watch the video below of our test race driver, Nick, lapping cars during this short demo ride given to Tim of SHMEE150...fab! &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h3&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;What Car Makes and Models are available today?

story:
Dream Chasers

We are dream-chasing family, inspired by our 3 children to make a big move from city to country...why?  For more together-time, closeness to nature and animals and relaxed family life.  We homeschool and live creatively, out-of-the-box, we now have a collection of farm animals, all with their own personalities and names!  We (mom and 2 daughters) are gals that love our tea, love to inspire wellness and love being crafty!  DustyMoon Teas and Treasures will further strengthen our bonds, unleash our creativity and add to our homeschooling journey!  Spending time together is our focus in life and working together will help to achieve that!  We've taken many risks and faced many challenges, help us to invest in this next stage of our dream so we can get our products and ideas into the local county markets!It has been our dream to run a small business together for many years, now the 'daughters' are mature enough to really take on a piece of that dream and make it real.

Our Teas and Treasures

Our 'Teas' are organic loose leaf teas that will 'start conversations and warm the soul'.  We plan to offer tea infused recipes and beautiful gift baskets for tea lovers.

Our 'Treasures' are enchanted creations, that inspire quiet time and peace such as finger labyrinths, driftwood wands, dreamcatchers and accessories with a flair of gypsy romance and boho sass.  As time allows we will add to our collection of crafted pieces.  We plan to add essential oils to further enhance nature-inspired wellness.

This funding will help us to advertise, it will provide funds to purchase our teas, oils and  the packaging that goes along with it.  It will offer a chance to make a big start and get us into more markets.  If we don't reach our goal, we will not give up, we will just start smaller!

The Impact

We have inspired many people and families with our move from city to country, leaving behind all that was familiar in order to live a life that would feed the needs of our souls. We share this story with everyone we meet.  Opening this business is yet another way to spend more time together, while making a living doing so and teaching our children that an entrepreneurial spirit can have no limits.  Our blog will be advertised along with our products so that other dream chasers can be inspired.

    We do not face many risks with this endeavour, we are going for it, but the 'launch' will be far more successful if we can invest more into the product and our creations.
    We understand the limitations of the wallet and if you cannot help us out with a monetary contribution, but are inspired by our dreams, please pass this campaign around so others may be able to help!
 We are deeply grateful for your support!
story_txt:
Dream Chasers We are dream-chasing family, inspired by our 3 children to make a big move from city to country...why?  For more together-time, closeness to nature and animals and relaxed family life.  We homeschool and live creatively, out-of-the-box, we now have a collection of farm animals, all with their own personalities and names!  We (mom and 2 daughters) are gals that love our tea, love to inspire wellness and love being crafty!  DustyMoon Teas and Treasures will further strengthen our bonds, unleash our creativity and add to our homeschooling journey!  Spending time together is our focus in life and working together will help to achieve that!  We've taken many risks and faced many challenges, help us to invest in this next stage of our dream so we can get our products and ideas into the local county markets!It has been our dream to run a small business together for many years, now the 'daughters' are mature enough to really take on a piece of that dream and make it real.
Our Teas and Treasures
Our 'Teas' are organic loose leaf teas that will 'start conversations and warm the soul'.  We plan to offer tea infused recipes and beautiful gift baskets for tea lovers.
Our 'Treasures' are enchanted creations, that inspire quiet time and peace such as finger labyrinths, driftwood wands, dreamcatchers and accessories with a flair of gypsy romance and boho sass.  As time allows we will add to our collection of crafted pieces.  We plan to add essential oils to further enhance nature-inspired wellness.
This funding will help us to advertise, it will provide funds to purchase our teas, oils and  the packaging that goes along with it.  It will offer a chance to make a big start and get us into more markets.  If we don't reach our goal, we will not give up, we will just start smaller!
The Impact We have inspired many people and families with our move from city to country, leaving behind all that was familiar in order to live a life that would feed the needs of our souls. We share this story with everyone we meet.  Opening this business is yet another way to spend more time together, while making a living doing so and teaching our children that an entrepreneurial spirit can have no limits.  Our blog will be advertised along with our products so that other dream chasers can be inspired. We do not face many risks with this endeavour, we are going for it, but the 'launch' will be far more successful if we can invest more into the product and our creations.
We understand the limitations of the wallet and if you cannot help us out with a monetary contribution, but are inspired by our dreams, please pass this campaign around so others may be able to help!
  We are deeply grateful for your support!

story:
Breve reseña

Soy Franz Sattler, desde niño simpre estuve desarrollando inventos pero no existia en ese entonces como desarrollarlos, en la actualidad he desarrollado y creado marcas y empresas exitosas en Sudamerica y Estados Unidos.

El invento que estoy desarrollando ahora, va revolucionar la cosmetica, la higiene facial y hasta la moda, porque se trata del primer aspirador de espinillas, un invento que sin duda dejara del lado los obsoletos y antihigienicos metodos de extraerlas como pinzas, parches, cremas  o los dedos; este extractor incluso puede anticipar que se infecten.

Con la contribucion de ustedes por fin podremos solucionar el gran problema que ocacionan las espinillas en el rostro y que con todos los metodos que existen jamas se ha podido solucionar

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes


  • La mitad del financiamiento va a la produccion del invento, una cuarta parte consiste en costos de diseño y transporte, el restante 25% son gastos de certificacion, publicidad y comisiones de Indiegogo.
  • Si no llegamos a la meta los fondos serán destinados a producir en serie el invento a menor escala, hasta lograr introducir el producto en el mundo.

El impacto

  • Actualmente no existe un metodo higienico que elimine las espinillas del rostro
  • Las pinzas , cremas , jabones especiales, parches, salones de belleza donde te apretan el rostro con los dedos, seran cosas del pasado.
  • Este aspirador es higienico y extrae directamente del poro el taco de pus o suciedad

Riesgos y desafíos

  • El riesgo podria estar en la demora de fabricar el producto en serie porque la mayoria de sus partes provienen de Asia y es distribuida por via maritima.
  • La ventaja de que el producto es pequeño y liviano hace que se pueda manejar su envio por via aerea.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no puedes colaborar refiere esta campaña que puede cambiar el estilo de vida de millones de personas en el mundo

story:
Who are we?
We are antifascists based in the Midlands, UK – currently in Birmingham, Coventry, Leicester and Nottingham- who are committed to challenging fascism, nationalism, racism, Islamophobia and anti-Semitism.

What do we believe?
We need to be proactive against fascism- this means no longer relying on the empty promises made by politicians that leave working class and communities of colour out in the cold. Fascism is used by the ruling class – rich people and 'decision makers' like politicians – to pit everyday people against each other based on the colour of their skin or which country they have travelled from. Fascism does nothing to alleviate the conditions of working class people, and relies on working class division and fear to thrive. We believe in tackling fascism physically, during demonstrations, outside of demonstrations, to have anti-racist messages seen in the built-environment and promote cooperative, egalitarian modes of being. Bringing the community together to educate each other and build networks of solidarity is what Midlands Antifascists is about.

Why fundraise?
There's a lot of work to be done, so, taking the lead from our antifascist comrades in London, we've decided to start fundraising online. Funds will be needed for posters, leaflets, banners, stickers, merchandise, transport for travelling to antifascist demonstrations around the country, room booking fees for community meetings, and any other resources needed for direct action. Even if you may not have the funds yourself to make a donation, then do make sure you share this page with other supporters and comrades! If you'd like to get involved as well, or you know people who've been involved with antifascist action in the Midlands, please send them our way! We're looking to expand to other towns and cities, and to reach the point where groups are strong enough we can cover smaller areas.

Stay in touch!
You can keep up to date with out activities by "liking" our Facebook page, Midlands Antifascists: https://www.facebook.com/MidlandsAntifascists?ref=hl Also, drop us a message at midlandsantifascists@riseup.net!

story:
WE WILL DONATE 1 POUND OF FOOD FOR EVERY DOLLAR DONATED!!!!!
We will donate to an Atlanta area food pantry or food outreach for every dollar donated!

Helping our local community, changing the farming model and being environmentally more responsible is what Southern Green Farms is all about. We want to build a model aquaponic vertical facility to teach others to grow like this and help localize food production.

We are a collection of people with many backgrounds all coming together to build a local farm where farming was not even possible before.  We are working in a facility that has been a diesel repair shop, a cultured marble manufacture and a boat building shop.  All of these entities have damaged the soil and the local environment to the point that traditional farming is not possible. We are working towards building a large aquaponic farm that will not only allow us to grow, but outgrow larger farms! All using less water, no pesticides and no man made fertilizers! Another plus is we are local so our transportation needs to the customer will be small compared to the traditional ways! We don't think about the cost of moving vegies from across the country!  Fish and produce growing in a closed ecosystem makes this possible.

Help us:

1. Improve local food production!

2. Create local jobs! ( we will have to hire helpers and delivery drivers soon)

3. Improve health with better foods! 

4. Help other local farms with our CSA!

5. Work towards teaching others to grow like we grow!

6. Clean up a small part of the environment!

7. Help Improve local food security!

8. Start a new farm where one couldn't have happened before!

9. Help local food charities by giving them fresh good foods!

Who are we?

Chris Cadle,

Chris was an automechanic for 18 years but has also been a gardener and raised livestock most of his life. Chris Started his first aquaponic system in his bedroom many years ago. It was a small beginning that lit a passion for sustainable green farming. He has been part of several local farming ventures including 413 farms and Sunshines Egg farms.

Sabrina Payne-Cadle

Chris's spouse is very active also in agriculture. Sabrina has been an Organic dirt farmer and a poultry farmer in Georgia. She has managed a commercial egg farm as well raised her own organic produce farm making her a great part of the team. Sabrina also helped in construction of 413 farms. She owned and managed Sunshines Egg Farms plus helped Chris set up and manage there first CSA.

Frank Savage

Frank has been a production engineer, a plastic manufacturing engineer, a boat builder and a mechanic. Franks engineering and knowledge of building and repurposing of materials gives us a unique  knowledge and experience base in building and maintaining the systems of aquaponics.

Steve Savage

Steve brings an amazing array of assets to the table. Steve has many years in fiberglass manufacturing and boat building. Steve also bring many years experience in repurposing materials and non tradition techniques in construction.  Steve also has extensive electrical and electronic knowledge. Building greenhouse, setting up pumping and building of tanks and growbeds are just a few things that Steve gives to the team. He and his brother Frank have run there own shop for close to 30 years so they also bring the business knowledge to the table.

Help us turn the above image into the below image

So why do we need the money? The start up of this type of farm is not cheap. Traditional funding channels still see it on the fringe and don't want to invest. Its funny that we can change the way we grow food but the banks and farm loan people don't want to lead the charge. That why we are coming to the people and giving you the chance to change the world!! We are in the process of building a 20 foot by 90 foot green house and buying or building the pieces of the aquaponics. That's were you help us! Your money goes to construction and start up costs. That's were all the money is going.  Yes this is a business, but one that knows that it cant live without the community its in and the people it grows for.  Even $5 to $10 dollar contributions help! It all goes to the goal of getting Southern Green up and running

story:
Short story about myself

Hello there! My name is Alexandru Cîrstoiu. I was born in Romania back in 1989 with muscular dystrophy, a degenerative condition that slowly destroys most muscles and has no cure. The illness has a really deceitful start and, so, until around the age of 6, I was a perfectly healthy boy. But then I started falling at random moments for no reason. My legs would suddenly lose all strength and I would drop on my knee. The falling was shortly followed by difficulty going up or down the stairs and lifting myself up, as well the inability to jump.

After the first symptoms, my parents notice something was wrong and they took me to a neurologist, and that's when I was first diagnosed with muscular dystrophy. At this moment in time the doctors thought it was the far less brutal form call Becker, but judging by how fast it was advancing they decided to take a biopsy. When the result came in, it couldn't have been worse; I had Duchenne muscular dystrophy, the nastiest and more lethal one of the bunch, with an average life expectancy of 25.

Hearing this kind of news when you're a child changes you, makes you see the concept of life differently. It ends up either crushing you and erasing any trace of hope or making you fight harder to survive and become a stronger person. The latter is hard to achieve, considering the degenerative nature of the illness, you stand there watching as each day you lose a piece of yourself. As such, by the age of 10, I was already bound to a wheelchair.

As any parents would do, mine too went through a period of denial, where they refuse to accept that their child had an incurable condition. And so we visited countless hospitals and tried numerous alternative remedies, which unfortunately meant my sister spent most of this time back at home with grandma, far from us. Eventually though we had to face reality and move forward.

So my family settled for the next best thing, helping me get a proper education. This is why I managed graduating University and even getting a Master's degree. It wasn't without expenses though. As my condition worsened we had to change several cars, which meant taking a loan that we are still paying even today. When you add to that the expenses with the different treatments I have tried, it adds up to a hefty amount over the years.

What exactly do I need help with

My entire life I have lived in an apartment situated at third floor, so the whole time I was in school, my parents had to carry me down and up the stairs close to everyday. It was even harder for my mom during the times when my dad would work; carrying someone taller than yourself is not an easy task for a woman.

But just like everybody does, my parents are growing older,the years of carrying me has had its toll on them and it's harder and harder to take me outside. This means I now spend most of my days in my room with the exception of the times I go for my medical checkups.

And this is why I need a house, a place where I can easily go outside without too much of an effort and that's more suited for my needs, the needs of a person mostly stuck in a bed because he doesn't really have easy access to the other rooms.

Unfortunately my country does little when it comes to helping disabled people get their on place that can actually improve their quality of life. The only thing the state has helped me with since becoming an adult is a monthly sum of 175$ or 140€, which is not enough to even live off of, never mind trying to get a home with that.

So here I am, humbly coming to ask for your help in my quest to getting a home.

What the money will be used for

If we reach the set goal all the money will go into acquiring the land and building the house, or if we're in luck buying an already built house and renovating it and adapting it for my needs.

If we're to fail the goal, all of the money gathered will go towards paying as much of the debts as we can.

So please help me realize this dream of ours, and don't worry if you can't donate, you can still help by spreading the words to your friends and family.

Sincerely, Alexandru.
