story:
I was certified as a “Pizzaiolo” (Pizza Chef) in Italy where I was stationed with the US Army.  I lived in Italy for five years, first as a student in Florence (2000-2001), then as an English teacher in Rome after receiving my Bachelors from CSU Long Beach (2003-2004) and just recently jumping out of airplanes with a rucksack in the Veneto for the 173rd Airborne Brigade (2013-2016).  I want to bridge the two cultures with Italian/Californian fusion style pizza.  Five years of eating and learning pizza in Italy combined with five years of employment in the California pizza industry while in High School and College, I have the knowhow to further the evolution of pizza in America.  Healthy foodies will be happy to have the option of healthy and delicious pizza made from ingredients from Italy and California, while participating in the next level of pizza evolution.  My "Pizzaiolo" (Pizza Chef) certificate and my culinary arts education from Orange Coast College along with my completion of the Department of Defense's and the Small Business administration's joint "Boots To Business" program gives me the needed skills and knowledge to succeed.

What I ask of you is to help me open my doors (by that I mean concession window) by contributing to the $20,000.00 that I need.  This money will go towards the hiring of employees, purchasing and installation of a 30qt commercial mixer, a toppings station, a pizza slice showcase/warmer, shelving for kitchen utensils, a Square point of sale system with cash drawer and iPad, licensing costs, graphics wraps for the truck and the trailer, as well as monthly costs to include commissary fees, trailer financing dues, insurance costs, ingredients, drinks and finally propane.

I am here on Indiegogo to ask anyone who is interested in supporting this Veteran Paratrooper who will pass on the favor to other Vets by offering meals and discounts.  Any homeless Wounded Warriors, homeless Purple Heart recipients and Active Duty Combat Arms Soldiers will get free meals and my personal assistance to help them succeed. 

Because pizza.  Help us by supporting our efforts to give back to the community.  We have perks designed to give pizza to Soldiers, Children and the Homeless.  Help us make a difference, allow us to deliver pizza as your token of gratitude and caring.

Please contribute what ever you can.  It is a win win for everyone.
 
Please also like us on Facebook and see our article in the OC Register: https://www.facebook.com/PizzamiBuscemi/
http://www.ocregister.com/articles/buscemi-7320...

story:
Passing of the Torch

Hi, I am Alyce Ray, a native of Opelousas, lover of fashion, art and culture, and aspiring business owner. I have been offered the amazing opportunity to acquire Pistache, a treasured local shop in the heart of historic Grand Coteau, Louisiana. 

Over the past few years, I have developed a close relationship with the current shop-owner, Nancy Brewer, helping her around the shop on a seasonal, as-need basis. I feel extremely grateful to have been under her tutelage as an aspiring entrepreneur and woman in business. Working so closely with Nancy has given me an understanding of the ins and outs of owning a small business and instilled in me the confidence of my own abilities in moving forward as the owner of Pistache.

Nancy won't be too far away as she will continue to bake her world-famous Gateau NaNa right next door at The Kitchen Shop!  Nancy and I can't wait to be shop neighbors and co-host fun events that mix shopping, music, art, and food in the courtyard. All of these ideas are so exciting, but I need a coup de main -a little boost- to off-set my start up expenses while leaping out on my own and realizing my dream!

What I Need & What You Can Get

I need $15,500 for start-up costs. Specifically, I need will help with: 

-the down-payment
-operating permits and deposits required
-a business computer
-new inventory for the holiday season, including lines from  local jewelers and artisans
-new website for the shop!

Here's the Best Part: You receive your contribution back! That's right! 100% of funds contributed over $10 will be given back to you on a Pistache gift-certificate. I will even break the total down into multiple gift-certificates, upon request, making this the perfect opportunity to knock out your Christmas shopping!  

The Impact

Each small business of Grand Coteau uniquely contributes to the success of the community at-large. Pistache has been successful for the past 12 years, providing women with timeless, classic clothing styles for work, play and all of life's milestones. The charm of Pistache represents the essence of the community itself. It is my intention to continue this tradition by contributing to the commerce of historic Grand Coteau!

Every SINGLE dollar counts! Your contribution, no matter how much, will help me successfully transition into entrepreneurship and become the owner of Pistache. Shop ownership changes hands on September 1st.

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Folks, you can help me simply by spreading the word! Make some noise about my campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram accounts. 
  • This is a great deal so tell ya mama and them!
  •  Christmas will be here before you know it and those gift cards will come in handy to offset your expenses in December!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

More on the Perks;

  • All perks must be picked up in person at Pistache. 
  • Please call Pistache after September 1st to coordinate the date and time for the exclusive after hours perk. 

And that's all to it -c'est tout! Thank you from the bottom of my heart for your generosity, love, and support!
story_txt:
Passing of the Torch
Hi, I am Alyce Ray, a native of Opelousas, lover of fashion, art and culture, and aspiring business owner. I have been offered the amazing opportunity to acquire Pistache, a treasured local shop in the heart of historic Grand Coteau, Louisiana. 
Over the past few years, I have developed a close relationship with the current shop-owner, Nancy Brewer, helping her around the shop on a seasonal, as-need basis. I feel extremely grateful to have been under her tutelage as an aspiring entrepreneur and woman in business. Working so closely with Nancy has given me an understanding of the ins and outs of owning a small business and instilled in me the confidence of my own abilities in moving forward as the owner of Pistache.
Nancy won't be too far away as she will continue to bake her world-famous Gateau NaNa right next door at The Kitchen Shop!  Nancy and I can't wait to be shop neighbors and co-host fun events that mix shopping, music, art, and food in the courtyard. All of these ideas are so exciting, but I need a coup de main -a little boost- to off-set my start up expenses while leaping out on my own and realizing my dream!


What I Need & What You Can Get
I need $15,500 for start-up costs. Specifically, I need will help with: 
-the down-payment-operating permits and deposits required-a business computer-new inventory for the holiday season, including lines from  local jewelers and artisans-new website for the shop!
Here's the Best Part: You receive your contribution back! That's right! 100% of funds contributed over $10 will be given back to you on a Pistache gift-certificate. I will even break the total down into multiple gift-certificates, upon request, making this the perfect opportunity to knock out your Christmas shopping!  

The Impact
Each small business of Grand Coteau uniquely contributes to the success of the community at-large. Pistache has been successful for the past 12 years, providing women with timeless, classic clothing styles for work, play and all of life's milestones. The charm of Pistache represents the essence of the community itself. It is my intention to continue this tradition by contributing to the commerce of historic Grand Coteau!Every SINGLE dollar counts! Your contribution, no matter how much, will help me successfully transition into entrepreneurship and become the owner of Pistache. Shop ownership changes hands on September 1st.

Other Ways You Can Help
You may not be able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

Folks, you can help me simply by spreading the word! Make some noise about my campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram accounts. 

This is a great deal so tell ya mama and them!

 Christmas will be here before you know it and those gift cards will come in handy to offset your expenses in December!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

More on the Perks;

All perks must be picked up in person at Pistache. 
Please call Pistache after September 1st to coordinate the date and time for the exclusive after hours perk. 

And that's all to it -c'est tout! Thank you from the bottom of my heart for your generosity, love, and support!

story:
Hi, we’re Dynamo – and we want the city of New Orleans to have better sex.

Surprising, right? After all, EVERYONE knows that New Orleans is already the sexiest city around. But there’s one thing the Crescent City currently lacks – an inclusive, welcoming, sex-positive shop. That’s where we come in!

Dynamo is an independent, female-run romantic boutique, founded right here in New Orleans. We’ve been around since 2013 as an online store and pop-up shop. You may have seen us at LA46, The New Movement Theater, or at shows inside the Allways Lounge. We’ve been working hard to turn our little pop-up into a real brick and mortar. And we’ve just found our dream home, right on St Claude Avenue! Problem is, some renovations are required before we can officially open our doors.

Sexuality-related businesses are actually ineligible for SBA loans. Weird, right? So instead, we’re asking our amazing community to help us get over this last hump (heh!). This campaign will help us pay for construction to bring our location up to code, so that we can provide high-quality products and sexual health information to New Orleans and the Gulf South!

 

Why Indiegogo?

We’re already so, so close to opening. After all, we’ve been in business as a pop-up shop for three years! The business has grown organically as demand has increased, and we have never spent beyond our means. So we’re actually doing fine on inventory, furniture, and even our point of sale system! And our new location is a total dream – one third of an amazing 1800s-era building, right on the new St Claude streetcar line. We've checked with the city and our zoning is A-OK. We’ve even got a wonderful, supportive landlord! But it turns out that this dream location requires a final round of renovations to bring it up to code.

In order to open, we will need to improve our unit’s fire safety and update it for accessibility. We’re planning to do as much of the work ourselves as possible to save on costs (we are handy women!), but we will need the help of professional contractors to get the job done.

Here’s a breakdown of where your contributions will be going:

  • Additional fire walls between the shop and the adjacent units: $2800
  • Expanding the restroom for handicapped accessibility: $2500
  • Construction of wrap-around wheelchair ramp (our building is raised over 2 feet): $3000
  • Architect's fees: $1,300
  • City fees, surprise costs, and helping to cover our bills while the work is being completed: $900

        = $10,500

We will still attempt to go forward with renovations whether this campaign is fully funded or not. Every little bit helps, and like we said, our landlord is awesome. However, the more we can raise, the sooner we can open – and the more events we can host when we do!

 

What do you mean by “sex-positive?”

Sex positivity is simply the idea that sex, as long as it is healthy and explicitly consensual, is a fundamentally positive thing. In the words of the Progressive Pleasure Club, a coalition of amazing sexuality stores around the US and Canada, sex positive shops:

  • Provide pleasure-based, shame-free education
  • Provide a sex-positive, hate-free space in our stores and online
  • Are inclusive of all genders and orientations
  • Provide informed product selection and accurate information regarding the safety of toys and other product materials
  • Advocate for more eco-friendly, non-toxic, and ethical manufacturing in the adult industry

 

What Dynamo provides:

No Shame

We believe that sex is a lot of things—it’s beautiful, it’s natural, it’s silly, and it’s fun. It’s important. What it shouldn’t be is shameful. We welcome everyone, regardless of gender or orientation, and strive to provide a cheerful, comfortable, stress-free environment. Our store is lovely, clean, and well-lit: perfect for nervous first-timers, curious couples, and sexual olympians alike. We want to be the place you’re proud to be seen leaving with bags in hand!

High Quality

Dynamo carries ONLY high quality, body-safe products. Did you know that the sex toy industry is completely unregulated? That means manufacturers can create and sell adult toys with no oversight – and they often use harmful chemicals to cut costs. Ever have a vibrator break after one use? Ever seen a melted sex toy? That’s because it was made with cheap, unregulated materials – which not only decrease the lifespan of the toy, but can harm the most sensitive areas of our bodies as well. For example, chemicals called phthalates have been deemed so toxic that they are actually banned in children’s and specific dog toys. But you can still find them in some vibrators!

That’s why at Dynamo, we completely curate our inventory for quality and safety. We only carry toys made of 100% silicone, non-porous plastic, glass, and/or metal. Our lube, bath and body, and kink selections are carefully vetted as well. Your sexual health is paramount to us.

A Community Resource

We’re more than a retail shop. We’re a community center, a safe space, and an inclusive resource for honest, accurate information about sex. Many of us who grew up in the South never received sex education growing up – or if we did, it was severely lacking or tinged with misinformation. Dynamo provides a place for adults to ask questions and learn about sex in a welcoming environment. We bring in nationally-recognized educators to speak on topics from kink to safer sex to keeping monogamy fresh. We’ve presented to university students, festival organizers, and bachelorettes. And, once our brick and mortar is finally open, we’ll be able to bring in even MORE programming throughout the year.

 

Other Ways You Can Help!

Our online store is open for business! Shopping with us online helps us to generate income even as we wait to open our brick and mortar. Visit us at dynamotoys.com.

And if you aren’t able to contribute, you can still help us get the word out! Please share our campaign with your pals and any open-minded folks who might be interested!

You can also follow us on:

Instagram: @dynamonola

Twitter: @dynamonola

Facebook: Search Dynamo: A Romantic Boutique in the Deep South

story:
As a working mother, you know the feats of which you are capable. You know that when you put your mind to something, you are essentially unstoppable. There is nothing that can get in your way, and you continue to impress even yourself. Still, there are certain changes that you would make to your lifestyle if you were only given the chance. This is that chance. Live your life on your own terms, integrating your personal life and your professional life as much or as little as you want. It’s called Dear Mom Office, and it’s going to change the way people think about their office space.

Dear Mom Office is an office space in California that is sure to be a dream come true for many working parents. In addition to offering a partial day care, we will provide organic coffee/tea, free Wi-Fi, fax machines, copy machines, and of course, office space. As working parents ourselves, we know how hard it is to juggle home life and work life. The solution we have come up with is a question: why keep them separate? Our answer is that there is no reason.

Bringing to the table an entrepreneurial spirit and childcare experience, we are determined to make this concept work and expand our brand out into every state. 
Soon, Dear Mom Office will not be a niche or a novel idea but merely another option to choose from as you are figuring out your work arrangements. You come into Dear Mom Office, set your child up, set yourself up, and get going, taking breaks to visit with your little one whenever it is convenient to you. We take care of everything else! 

Right now, we have come to you, for help raising $19,000. This start-up capital is going to cover the costs of launching, hire appropriate staff, marketing, and initially operating Dear Mom Office. We are aiming for the opening of Dear Mom Office on October 3rd. 

We, respectfully turn to you to please support us in one or all of the following ways;
• Donate to help fund our Dear Mom Office Startup.
• Refer us to individuals you know who might be interested in contributing to the support of    Dear Mom Office Startup.

Our generous donors will receive a thank you gift, on behalf of Dear Mom Office and thank you in advance for the continued support! We appreciate all contributions, and we are grateful to you for your time. 

For more information;
Please visit us today at  www.DearMomOffice.com 

Sincerely, 


Pamela & Linda, Co-founders
Dear Mom Office

story:
TWO DETERMINED LADIES EMBARKING ON A MISSION TO BROADEN REACH AND INSPIRE THE WORLD ONE PAGE AT A TIME!


ABOUT IN LAKESH MAGAZINE 

With the recent launch of In Lakesh Magazine online in May 2016, the publishing world has been enriched by this publication’s powerful storytelling, informative reporting, and inspirational message.  In addition to the enormous value that In Lakesh Magazine already provides, the publishers would also like to take the almost unheard-of step of eliminating all ads from its pages. 

The media and the world of advertising have always been an integral part of our lives.   Although they serve a great purpose, they can also shape our way of thinking in ways we may not be aware.   In Lakesh Magazine, would like to continue to provide an ad-free environment for its readers  and enable them to fully enjoy the written pieces without the distraction of promotional messages. 

In addition, we want to give the reader the opportunity to connect in an even more profound way to the stories via an audio option that is included in each monthly publication!    HOW AWESOME IS THAT!

In Lakesh Magazine's mission is to create greater and stronger unity of people from every corner of the world.  Our online publication truly has a beating heart!

Your donations will be considered as contributions towards our mission and will help fund In Lakesh Magazine for the next 24 month as we build our subscriber base and generate enough revenues to be self-sufficient.  

CHECK OUT OUR PROSPERITY ANGELS PERKS!!!!!



The funds we raise will be invested back into the magazine, to support the expenses related to publishing in three languages as well the development of a professional marketing strategy, enhance our website and to be able to pay freelancers for their work.  These funds will allow us to publish in other languages and enable IN LAKESH MAGAZINE to share its message of hope to an even greater audience.   


Develop a professional Marketing Plan   $  5,000.00
Improve current Website design and content  $  4,000.00
Yearly cost for writers (approx. $500/month)  $  6,000.00
Launch IN LAKESH MAGAZINE in Brazil in November 2016  $  4,000.00
Yearly Cost to release Portuguese version   $  11,000.00
Yearly cost to release English and French versions   $  34,500.00

The founder herself does not receive any salary at this time, and is fully committed to reinvesting all revenues generated in the next 24 months back into the magazine to ensure the IN LAKESH MISSION AND MESSAGE reach as many people in as many countries/languages as possible. 




CLICK HERE TO VIEW OUR PROMOTIONAL ISSUE IN ENGLISH:

http://viewer.epageview.com/Viewer.aspx?docid=f...


The Impact

In Lakesh Magazine wants to change the way we receive information, by offering the reader cover to cover content without any advertising. It also offers an AUDIO OPTION to listen to the article or story giving a more intimate experience to its audience.  We want to give every subscriber the opportunity to explore their own thoughts without any disruptions.  

Much like American Idol offered a chance for the people to support and select their idol instead of allowing the big corporate star makers to choose for them, In Lakesh Magazine wants to do the same.  We believe we should give the power back to the people and offer them a product filled with positivity, inspiration, compassion and good intentions and allow them to help mold the kind of magazine they wish to receive.

Our goal is to continue to offer In Lakesh Magazine in as many languages as we can in order to share our message of unity and compassion to all.   The magazine is currently available if both French and English and will be released in Portuguese in January 2017, and hopefully in many more languages in the years to come!


BE SURE TO CHECK OUT OUR PERKS!

BE FEATURED ON OUR MAGAZINE COVER!   

RECEIVE A FULL PAGE IN OUR MAGAZINE TO TELL YOUR STORY!


Challenges

In Lakesh Magazine is currently 100% funded by the founder.  Sylvie believes in this magazine and its mission so passionately that she has dedicated and invested all her time, funds and effort to ensure the magazine becomes successful.   we are seeking financial support from all the PROSPERITY ANGELS out in the world who believe in our mission. 

Other Ways You Can Help

SUBSCRIBING is the simplest way to go to show your encouragement!  

Because we chose not to seek financial aid from advertisers to sustain the magazine, we appreciate getting the support of every individual that subscribe to our online publication at the low cost of C$2.50/month. 

With that investment, each subscriber not only receives rich inspirational content every single month, but they also show their support for In Lakesh Magazine's cause and mission.  

TO SUBSCRIBE SIMPLY CLICK ON THE FOLLOWING LINK AND REGISTER!  ITS AS SIMPLE AS THAT! 

 http://inlakesh.epageview.com/

www.inlakeshmagazine.com

United we are stronger and we can change the world!  

Together, we are one.

story:
Story ~ Invitation ~ Participation and Support


STORY

We are a dedicated team of 11 seasoned hosts and facilitators from the US and Europe  - holding a wide range of experience and skill. We believe it is right timing to step into new patterns of being human together, with clarity and intention. [The Team]


Collective Healing is the work, and it's needed everywhere. 

Our inquiry began in 2012 and has embodied collective healing every step of the way. We’ve been practicing and developing competencies to support healing at a collective level, discovering how to heal the same patterns in ourselves too. Now, we are inviting others to join us in bringing these practices into the world to generate wider circles of impact. 


We seek to work at the  root-level of age-old patterns and today’s most entrenched challenges - such as racism, inequality, immigration, and more - to allow the necessary healing to embolden our shared creativity, resilience, and ongoing efforts for a wiser future.


This is an evolutionary opportunity!

This work is leverage for healing our collective past and creating new possibilities for the future, unleashing potential ... creating a new story!


We have nurtured this healing seed until now, offering our skills, time, care, resources, and attention ... and know that, in order for this seed to emerge, grow, be sustainable, and thrive ... additional resources and widening participation are needed.  This is our invitation to you now.


INVITATION

Our step now is inviting you to support this work with resources and gather with us – both online and in person – to prototype a process that builds a community’s capacity to work with historic traumas. Our team has experience with a wealth of practices that enable deep-rooted issues to be tended, and wherever possible, healed. We see the potential of weaving together these powerful practices to create group experiences that foster belonging and invite post-traumatic growth.


We are calling for participation and resourcing to support the development and practice of collective healing, inspired by these questions: How can we create safe, generative healing spaces that empower groups and communities to access healing shifts ... and allow life and love to be restored? How can communities address these unhealed collective conflicts and traumas in ways that propel us to higher levels of connection, creativity, collaboration and resilience?


On August 18-21, we call the first in-person gathering, taking place in Florida. We invite your participation and support.  We intend to keep opening the space wider for collective healing and a wiser future to emerge. Already, there are plans to host future gatherings in New England, Minnesota and Europe.

At the first gathering, in Florida, you will:

• Experience a rich combination of ways to approach collective healing that you can integrate into your work and life

• Deepen your skills in using empathic ways of knowing to understand the historical patterns that affect a situation

• Experience shifts in releasing stuck patterns and insights into healthy pathways forward

• Discover the creative impulse that arises out of the experience of sustained collective presence and witnessing

• Connect, learn together, build friendships, or even create initiatives with others who are drawn to explore collective healing practices


Insights and learning will be shared widely beyond this event. The aspiration is that experiences and connections among participants will seed a community of practice and new collaborations. To learn more, to register, and to sign up for our newsletter, visit:  www.collectivehealing.net


PARTICIPATION & SUPPORT

The team developing this initiative has invested our own time and resources to bring it to this point. To enable this work to gain traction, it is time to energize the strong support and participation of all those yearning for discovery of new paths for collective healing.

Your participation and support - including financial - will enable the work to develop and be of service in places where collective healing is so needed. It will also help create an on-line space to connect a global community of collective healing, providing a space for those doing this important work, where trauma and division exist, to keep coming together, sharing stories and best practices.


We seek to raise $30,000 to provide a healthy flow of resources to support this promising work. This will:

  • Sustain support for the first prototype Collective Healing gathering in Florida in August, 2016, including venue rental, scholarships for participants and travel expenses for the hosting team
  • Enable us to host several virtual conversations via global calls for dialogue about collective healing
  • Document the process and learning from the Florida event and widely share it to advance the field 
  • Seed the next steps of the work, including plans for other gatherings, continue evolving the website, wisdom-sharing, and community-building through on-line, multi-media platforms


Perks, Rewards and Participation Levels

In our society, money is a source of deep wounding in need of collective healing.  We have touched this wound repeatedly in our work together and we sense the opportunity to live in a different relationship to money.  This crowd-funding request is one place for us to learn and truly practice this. 


This request is actually an invitation into participation - whether you join us in the August or not.  We invite all who are drawn to join us in exploring and designing new ways to cultivate collective healing and regenerative approaches.  We trust that everyone will find their place and level of participation.  For some, it could be participating or hosting of future events while for others it may be simply supporting the process emotionally or financially from a distance.  Similarly, we know that people have different abilities to contribute financially and we honor the spirit of every gift without regard to the amount.  Some participants will need financial help to be able to attend the event.  Others may be able to contribute generously while not able to attend this first event.  Some may contribute a small amount while others might offer hundreds or thousands of dollars.  All levels of participation are welcome and gratefully accepted.


This invitation into participation is non-transactional and the notion of giving rewards or perks of greater value for higher levels of financial contribution is not consistent with our longing to experience money as an aspect of exchange, sharing and building relationships.  We value all forms of participation and contribution including financial. 

We are excited to share these gifts (in place of rewards or perks) with anyone who wishes to participate without tying the gifts to levels of financial contribution:

·  Our heartfelt gratitude

·  A compilation of poetry, quotes, resources, and links from the three-year dialogue on collective healing to date (sent shortly)

·  A harvest document from the August event containing learnings, questions, poetry and more (sent after the event)

·  Access to this growing community of practice, including a Facebook community

·  Invitation to participate in two hosted virtual conversations on topics of collective healing 

Together we will seek to find additional ways to express the spirit of gratitude, generosity and additional opportunities for participation.


Other Ways You Can Help

Your participation is an impactful gift, like tipping the scales in generative ways that will support this work to happen. It will continue to catalyze our efforts and add to the call of Creating Collective Healing Spaces.

So, please share this link, tell your friends, invite, contribute, participate!!

Join us! Help this seed take root and grow! 


With love and gratitude,

Judy, Analesa, Beth, Ria, Steve, Sarah, Holly, Luea, Madeleine, Katie, and Tenneson with Kamyar Houbakht our video artist.

Story ~ Invitation ~ Participation and Support
STORY
We are a dedicated team of 11 seasoned
hosts and facilitators from the US and Europe 
- holding a wide range of experience and skill. We believe it is
right timing to step into new patterns of being human together, with clarity and
intention. [The Team]
Collective Healing is the work, and it's
needed everywhere. Our inquiry began in 2012 and has embodied collective healing every step of the way. We’ve been practicing and developing competencies to support healing at a collective level, discovering how to heal the same patterns in ourselves too. Now, we are inviting others to join us in bringing these practices into the world to generate wider circles of impact. We seek to work at the  root-level of age-old patterns and today’s most entrenched challenges - such as racism, inequality, immigration, and more - to allow the necessary healing to embolden our shared creativity, resilience, and ongoing efforts for a wiser future.This is an evolutionary opportunity! This work is leverage for healing our collective past and creating new possibilities for the future, unleashing potential ... creating a new story!We have nurtured this healing seed until now, offering our skills, time, care, resources, and attention ... and know that, in order for this seed to emerge, grow, be sustainable, and thrive ... additional resources and widening participation are needed.  This is our invitation to you now.INVITATIONOur step now is inviting you to support this work with resources and gather with us – both online and in person – to prototype a process that builds a community’s capacity to work with historic traumas. Our team has experience with a wealth of practices that enable deep-rooted issues to be tended, and wherever possible, healed. We see the potential of weaving together these powerful practices to create group experiences that foster belonging and invite post-traumatic growth.We are calling for participation and resourcing to support the development and practice of collective healing, inspired by these questions: How can we create safe, generative healing spaces that empower groups and communities to access healing shifts ... and allow life and love to be restored? How can communities address these unhealed collective conflicts and traumas in ways that propel us to higher levels of connection, creativity, collaboration and resilience?

On August 18-21, we call the first in-person gathering, taking place in Florida. We
invite your participation and support.  We intend to keep opening the space wider for collective
healing and a wiser future to emerge. Already, there are plans to host future gatherings in New England, Minnesota and Europe.

approach collective healing that you can integrate into your work and life

knowing to understand the historical patterns that affect a situation

story:
Our Story

Imagine the delight of a child enjoying a cotton candy pedicure while devouring a princess ice cream sundae uniquely prepared exactly to their liking. Then, take a moment to imagine moving on to a Fruit Loop manicure, topped off with a hair wrap doused in hot pink and orange, and to complete the ‘sweet’ experience -- some glitter make-up for the ultimate sparkle.

Immersed in a heavenly Candyland atmosphere, with cupcakes on the walls and cherries hanging from above, ‘Sundae Spa’ is a magical fantasy of kids everywhere.  A fairy tale brought to life, Sundae Spa is the business that ‘love’ built.

Inspiration

Sundae Spa is the brilliant concept of former science teacher Kimberly Swan whose inspiration evolved during a family vacation. After booking a spa experience for her kids that promised a lot of fun and sweet treats, the experience left them with nothing more than a sour taste.  During their 3-hour drive home, the Swan family’s creative juices started flowing and the idea for a ‘yummy’ spa experience was cooked up!

Sundae Spa

Sundae Spa was first ‘made’ in Kim’s office, with a huge story board filled with ideas. Those ideas transformed her basement into a mini-lab, with her kids morphing into blue Smurfs and pink princesses and a lesson learned NOT to use food coloring, which is suggested online.

After years of research and countless experiments, Kim had developed a book of recipes that would create the sweetest of spa experiences for kids.

Combining her love of teaching with what her kids loved, Kim created a concept that included an interactive experience.  Kids not only pick their own colors and flavors, but they learn about the science behind the services offered, like how one’s hair turns blue!

Following a two-year search for capital, the first Sundae Spa opened its doors in 2010.

Sundae Spa Mobile -- 'Wish' Upon a Sundae Star

Six years later, there are two Sundae Spa locations in Connecticut and now Kim’s ‘wish’ is to make dreams come true for those who are unable to come to one of the spas. To do that, kim wants to take Sundae Spa on the road and has launched this campaign to generate support for the ‘Wish’ Upon a Sundae Spa mobile.

Sundae Spa has partnered with one of the most recognizable national charities/organizations that grants 'wishes' to children with life-threatening illnesses.

The initial plans are to launch the ‘Wish’ Upon a Sundae Spa mobile in four locations:

- Hartford, CT

- Boston, MA

- Philadelphia, PA

- New York, NY

With your help, ‘Wish’ Upon a Sundae Spa mobile will travel to each city and host 12-15 of the national children’s organization Sundae Spa has partnered with to give those kids with life-threatening illnesses the most magical and incredible party ever.  These parties will be provided to the charity at NO CHARGE.

In addition, we will be auctioning off a party in each market with all proceeds being donated to the charity Sundae spa has partnered with.

The ‘Wish’ Upon a Sundae Spa mobile has created a special event package dedicated to this charity and a percentage of all parties will be directed back to the charity for more ‘wishes’ to be granted. 

For more information on the National charity, please visit our website:  www.sundaespa.com

What We Need & What You Get

The Perks

The perks are a small token of the generous contribution you will make to help us move forward.  Every perk includes a thank you. Some perks will include personalized cards and photos from the kids involved in our charity of choice.  Higher levels of giving will be rewarded not only with our heartfelt thanks, but additionally you will receive some of the party rewards that the kids will receive as part of their special day.  We want you to truly be involved with the experience you are bringing to those special kids.
 

The Campaign

The 'Wish" Upon a Sundae Spa campaign is a 60-day campaign.  If the necessary funds are not raised in this initial round, we will continue to fundraise through Indiegogo and alternative methods. 
 
I am so personally invested in this effort and determined to do everything I can to make 'Wish' Upon a Sundae Spa a reality.  If for some reason we are unable to raise the funds needed within a year, the money we do raise will be directed to the National charity we have partnered with.  We will meet with them and explore the most suitable way for the money to benefit the children.
 
For the larger contributions, with rewards that include website, social media and advertising, we will give you the option of receiving a $10,000 refund or you can request that all the money be donated to the charity.
 

The Impact

It has been a life-long dream to open my own business.  I was told by many that it would never happen.  I raised  7  girls, so no one knows better than me that anything is possible.  It took an extraordinary amount of time, dedication, sacrifice, do-overs and love, but at the end of the day I am a success and I couldn't be more grateful.

From the very beginning, I have shared my good fortune with child-related charities including : The Sunshine Kids Foundation; Make-A-Wish Foundation of Connecticut; Yale New Haven Children's Hospital; Department of Children and Adoption Services as well as taking part in smaller child fundraising events. Each one of us has the ability to make an incredible difference in a child's life.  I know, personally, how making a difference in a child's life has impacted my own -- I kiss them good morning and good night every single day.  While it does take money to help make some wishes come true, the personal rewards are immeasurable.

I need your help to make this special project, 'Wish' Upon A Sundae Spa, a dream come true.  Please know, that I have done extensive research and planning with my charity of choice to ensure that this campaign will be successful and will truly make a difference.  The charity has committed to be an integral part of all the events we have planned to launch our 'Wish' Upon a Sundae Spa mobile.  In addition to running this online campaign, we will be hosting other events to bring awareness to our efforts.  Along the way, we promise to keep you updated about our progress and to make you feel like you are on this journey with us.  At all of our events, we will interview the kids and post spotlights on our webpage allowing everyone to get to know the kids and their stories.

You have my promise and commitment that your money will make the difference in a child's life. Again, for more on the National charity we have partnered with, please go to our website:  www.sundaespa.com.

Risks & Challenges

Of course in everything you do, there are always risks and challenges that may be involved. Honestly, it's something that only make me want to work harder.  I have always taught my girls that in order to be successful sometimes you have to fail.  But that does not mean you give up.  It means you come back and do it better and try harder.   Nobody knows about not giving up and fighting more than the kids we are trying to help. 
 
My plan for overcoming any challenges that come my way will involve alternative methods to bring awareness to the campaign, which will including amping up our efforts to reach out to businesses and the community.  
 
We will be relying on traditional media, social media and bloggers to help us create awareness for this campaign. 
 
Other Ways You Can Help

If you like what we are all about and want to be a part of making a difference, but are unable to make a monetary donation at this time, no problem.  You can still help by spreading the word, letting others know what we are trying to do and encourage them to contribute to a cause that will make an incredible difference in a special child's life.  

Make sure to use the Indiegogo tools available and visit us on our website www.sundaespa.com and social media pages:

www.sundaespa.com/facebook

www.sundaespa.com/twitter

Creating excitement and sharing your thoughts and feelings about our campaign is another great way to be part of this cause.

Thank you for taking the time to learn about 'Wish' Upon A Sundae Spa and for all you will do to help.

Meet Our Family

Press

Sundae Spa, and its efforts with children's charities has been featured in numerous stories.  We appreciate everyone who has taken the time to share the Sundae Spa story.

 

 

With Sincere Gratitude,

Kimberly Swan

story:
Help Fortify Café, our beautiful independent 100% plant based business to survive and thrive.

 

http://www.fortifycafe.co.uk/

https://www.facebook.com/Fortify-Cafe-Vegan-Eatery-67605413089/

 

I’m James, the founder of Fortify Café – the only eatery in Maidstone’s local area with 100% plant based food cooked from scratch.

 

Vegans and non vegans love our quirky warm vibe and the chance to eat healthy, delicious food with a large selection of meals to choose from no matter what their food sensitivities.

 

  • We earned a TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence (2012-2016) https://www.tripadvisor.co.uk/Restaurant_Review-g187056-d1479291-Reviews-Fortify_Cafe-Maidstone_Kent_England.html
  • The Kent Messenger Newspaper listed us as one of their top 45 places to eat in Kent http://www.kentonline.co.uk/whats-on/news/our-guide-to-the-best-96108/
  • Food bloggers often write about us https://jadegreenvegan.com/2016/04/09/fortify-cafe-maidstone/ http://veggieathletic.com/review-fortify-cafe-maidstone/
  • Sir Paul McCartney has tried our food too! http://www.kentonline.co.uk/maidstone/news/paul-mccartney-8000/

 

We need your help now in order to survive. After much personal investment, to realise my dream of providing a healthy, fun café and community hub, we need an injection of funds. Our café is hugely popular but our limited space means we can’t generate the money needed to fill the hole in our foundational finances and develop the space and resources for growth.

 

We’ve already overcome many obstacles since 2009

  • Opening the business at the start of a recession
  • Being the only vegetarian/vegan business in the town and proving the naysayers wrong
  • Trade disrupting road works for 6 months (twice)
  • We’ve been open 7 years which means we’re one of the 50% of business that have succeeded beyond the first 5 years

 

Raising these essential funds would mean we can continue to provide employment, help keep the High Street vibrant and carry on cooking great plant based meals which we love doing. 

 

Fortify Café has the potential to become so much more and I have big dreams of what else we could achieve! Given some space to breathe, we’d love to start offering cookery lessons, hosting pop up events, documentary screenings and even write that cookery book that people keep asking us for!

 

Short term goals:

  • Settle the building costs and secure future lease
  • Partially remodel kitchen for greater efficiently
  • Partially remodel counter area providing more seating
  • Update our technology to provide a faster service

 

Long term goals:

  • Increase the café capacity by fitting out other areas of the building e.g. basement and potentially the flat above
  • Increase business profit (by increasing covers) in order to secure a platform for growth
  • Further develop the retail and menu offer to support awareness of the plant based movement by showcasing great food and products
  • Expand across the UK!

 

1st phase of funding

  • building/lease costs £22,000

2nd phase of funding

  • Cafe remodel - relocate/rebuild counter and serve over fridge area, banquette seating install, electronic point of sale £5,500
  • Kitchen remodel - install space saving fitted counters and shelving, replace flooring, wall repairs and tiling, install extraction fan £8,200

3rd phase of funding

  •  Cafe remodel - space optimising tables and chairs, ceiling and lighting repair, replace flooring, redecoration and complete CCTV installation £5,500
  • Exterior - repair/replace signage, redecoration, install barriers / plants / umbrellas £1,500

 

If you donate £50 or more, we have a limited number of exclusive Fortify Café mugs or t-shirts to give away when you opt in to receive a perk. 

 

This is a flexible funding campaign. If we reach 50% of our goal, we can secure the lease and continue as we are for the time being (1st phase of funding only). If the whole funding target is reached, the short term goals will be achieved (1st, 2nd & 3rd phase of funding). 

 

Remember, sharing is caring – please let others know about our campaign and get in touch if you have any questions.

 

Our inspiration:

 

https://www.richroll.com/

http://www.cowspiracy.com/

http://www.nationearth.com/earthlings-1/

http://www.forksoverknives.com/
story_txt:
Help Fortify Café, our beautiful independent 100% plant based business to survive and thrive. http://www.fortifycafe.co.uk/https://www.facebook.com/Fortify-Cafe-Vegan-Eatery-67605413089/ I’m James, the founder of Fortify Café – the only eatery in Maidstone’s local area with 100% plant based food cooked from scratch. Vegans and non vegans love our quirky warm vibe and the chance to eat healthy, delicious food with a large selection of meals to choose from no matter what their food sensitivities. 
We earned a TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence (2012-2016) https://www.tripadvisor.co.uk/Restaurant_Review-g187056-d1479291-Reviews-Fortify_Cafe-Maidstone_Kent_England.html

The Kent Messenger Newspaper listed us as one of their top 45 places to eat in Kent http://www.kentonline.co.uk/whats-on/news/our-guide-to-the-best-96108/

Food bloggers often write about us https://jadegreenvegan.com/2016/04/09/fortify-cafe-maidstone/ http://veggieathletic.com/review-fortify-cafe-maidstone/

Sir Paul McCartney has tried our food too! http://www.kentonline.co.uk/maidstone/news/paul-mccartney-8000/

 We need your help now in order to survive. After much personal investment, to realise my dream of providing a healthy, fun café and community hub, we need an injection of funds. Our café is hugely popular but our limited space means we can’t generate the money needed to fill the hole in our foundational finances and develop the space and resources for growth. We’ve already overcome many obstacles since 2009
Opening the business at the start of a recession
Being the only vegetarian/vegan business in the town and proving the naysayers wrong
Trade disrupting road works for 6 months (twice)
We’ve been open 7 years which means we’re one of the 50% of business that have succeeded beyond the first 5 years
 Raising these essential funds would mean we can continue to provide employment, help keep the High Street vibrant and carry on cooking great plant based meals which we love doing.  Fortify Café has the potential to become so much more and I have big dreams of what else we could achieve! Given some space to breathe, we’d love to start offering cookery lessons, hosting pop up events, documentary screenings and even write that cookery book that people keep asking us for! Short term goals:
Settle the building costs and secure future lease
Partially remodel kitchen for greater efficiently
Partially remodel counter area providing more seating
Update our technology to provide a faster service
 Long term goals:
Increase the café capacity by fitting out other areas of the building e.g. basement and potentially the flat above
Increase business profit (by increasing covers) in order to secure a platform for growth
Further develop the retail and menu offer to support awareness of the plant based movement by showcasing great food and products
Expand across the UK!
 1st phase of fundingbuilding/lease costs £22,0002nd phase of funding
Cafe remodel - relocate/rebuild counter and serve over fridge area, banquette seating install, electronic point of sale £5,500
Kitchen remodel - install space saving fitted counters and shelving, replace flooring, wall repairs and tiling, install extraction fan £8,200
3rd phase of funding
 Cafe remodel - space optimising tables and chairs, ceiling and lighting repair, replace flooring, redecoration and complete CCTV installation £5,500
Exterior - repair/replace signage, redecoration, install barriers / plants / umbrellas £1,500
 If you donate £50 or more, we have a limited number of exclusive Fortify Café mugs or t-shirts to give away when you opt in to receive a perk.  This is a flexible funding campaign. If we reach 50% of our goal, we can secure the lease and continue as we are for the time being (1st phase of funding only). If the whole funding target is reached, the short term goals will be achieved (1st, 2nd & 3rd phase of funding).  Remember, sharing is caring – please let others know about our campaign and get in touch if you have any questions. Our inspiration: https://www.richroll.com/http://www.cowspiracy.com/http://www.nationearth.com/earthlings-1/http://www.forksoverknives.com/

story:
The issue:

Dó plants (with scientific name as Rhamnoneuron balansae) is used for making the famous handmade Dó papers in Vietnam since XIII century. At the present, Dó plants have become more and more noble due to its existence far in the primitive forests as well as a wide distribution with small species.

Being under threat of extinction with severe living environment damages, Dó tree have been put into the Red book.

In other words, this kind of handmade traditional paper, together with long lasting handicrafts villages like Yen Phong, Dong Cao, Dong Ho…, is in danger of extinction and a likelihood of forever disappearance.

Dướng (mulberry) is gradually being replaced with Dó for traditional manual paper production, as a result of its toughness, persistence and wasp repellent. Through corporation with the skillful craftsmen, several unsound of material excavation have been found, well illustrating the fact that the purchasers in Bac Ninh have no idea of the plant origins; whereas the artisans from Hoa Binh randomly collect mulberries for their production. This, in a nutshell, not only has a great impact to the original forestry but also the quality of handmade products.

Therefore, we have reached the solutions on growing forest alternatively with materials plant as a way to ensure the stable quality and manage the uncontrollable choppings.

Zó, as a social enterprise with the mission of preserving the ancient technique of handmadepaper of Vietnam, we always follow a total handmade procedure of producing papers without harmful environmental effects. In this campaign, an association has been made with Vietherb and Dichung to bring up the status of herbs growing for enhancing local economic development, as well as coloring the green surroundings here.

The project

The expected location occupies a large amount of forestry land; furthermore, the residents here are also focusing on developing their traditional handmade products, enhancing the extension of cultivating paper mulberry as a way to preserve the traditional industries and keep these plants from oncoming extinction. 

We identified the area with the 3 ha in total for planting trees along existed nature forest.

We plan to plant a total of 6,900 trees from different species (dướng tree, Abelmoschus manihot, Polyscias fruticose,ect )

 

-  6900 cultivars

-  600 kg of compost

-  Workforce (planting + fence construction + maintenance)

 

Inputs

Price per unit (USD)

Quantity

Total

Dướng Tree cultivation

$ 0.13

6000

$ 800

1- year old tree cultivation

$ 0.26

300

$ 80

3-5 year old tree cultivation

$ 0.26

Long-term tree cultivation

$ 0.26

Wage : 1USD= 22.5000 VND (based on 2016)

 

 No of working day

Costs per person

Total costs

Plantation (3ha)

250

$ 8       

$ 2000

Maintenance

48

$ 8

$ 384

Establishment amount: $ 3424

Note :

  • The detailed budget is available upon request.
  • Make incubator for multiplication of paper mulberry
  • The 01 year old plants shall be multiplicated through making planting trays on top of the pad, building and taking care of the incubator.The paper mulberry, however, will be brought for cultivation in the forestry.
  • However, there’s a need for maintaining annual forest protection and recycling (at least within the first two years).

 

Impacts from the project:

Several benefits of the Dướng tree (mulberry) can be named as follows:

- To be easily cultivated and speedily recycled.

- To be cultivated alternatively with other supplementary plants in view of its shadow capability.

- To be a potential material for paper manufacturing, replace Zo plant which is under threat of extinction, and reserve a noble traditional manual industry in Vietnam.

- To be used as a medicine.

In order to persuade the local people to reduce growing low economic plants, at the same time, enhance the perceptions and responsibility towards forest protection, we have conducted the mission of alternatively cultivating short day plants and high economic plants, corporate with the local people and competent authorities in order to arrange material area in order and ensure the environmental objectives. This will potentially create more work for local villager. The community of paper making in this area was much bigger 10 years ago, but now, there are only 10 middle- age villagers still making the paper. Due to the lack of income from making paper, since the papers are sold with very cheap price and they had to give up on this job to work in farm and exploit natural forest to earn their living. The shortage in term of income also made young local have no interest in joining the community.

Imagine when the 10 middle-ages villager stop making paper, who would be the one living the traditional technique up? Where is the future then for the Vietnam handmade paper?

With this campaign, we aims to enhance the paper making community, from 10 current villagers to 30, especially encourage the younger generation taking up the knowledge about paper making process by showing them the potential of this job. Mostly young people now in the village either work at the industrial zone under extreme hard condition or being unemployed, thanks to the overwhelmingly fast urbanization. Making handmade paper can not only preserve the traditional technique but also create a new concept of working in the village (and hopefully other village), which is sustainable development.

By having a stable resource for the process of making paper ( with international qualification), their income expectedly to gain 03 imes per year, from 1,000,000 VND  to 3,000,000 VND, this result will directly support their livelihood in many way, especially for their kids to go to school and get  higher education

Taking part in this project means supporting a community, a part of our green-lung and initiatively protecting Vietnam traditional handmade paper.

How can you participate?

With only $ 5.00 we can cultivate 37 duong trees

With only $ 10 we can cultivate 37 duong tree, 10 other types of long-term medical trees

With $ 20 we can cultivate 20 the 1-year old trees

With $ 50 we can cultivate 384 duong trees

With $100 we can cultivate 37 duong tree, 10 other types of long-term medical trees AND pay for a worker yearly.

You can also visit our website www.lovetreelovepaper.wix.com/zoproject or follow us on Facebook or Yotube Channel

You can also help us by many valuable ways to contribute:

+ Using social media and spread your words about our campaign by using hashtag: #lovetreelovepaper #environment # sustainable

+ Give us a hand by organizing fundraising event in your place: school, working places, ect even public places!

+ For who don't have credit card, you can contribute directly to our bank account as follow:
Tran Hong Nhung

0021000351238

Vietcombank Hanoi

story:
Who I Am and What I'm Doing...

     My name is Amber Sarivan and I love to bake. More than that, I love to feed people. When I see people enjoy my creations and remark about their taste and appearance it makes my heart full. My mom is the person responsible for this infatuation I have in the kitchen. One distinct memory I have growing up is that of people regularly asking my mom for her recipes as they raved about the containers of left-overs they toted out the door with them.

   I attended Warren County Technical School in Washington, New Jersey for Culinary Arts and Baking. I took home a silver medal in the state for my baking skills at a Skills USA competition. But my mom had it right when she taught me that it takes heart to make food that keeps people wanting more.

   For the past few years I have been preparing to open my own bakery. I have done my research, I have written a business plan, and I have practiced and perfected recipe after recipe, always dreaming of the day I could put my hard work to work for me. 

    And this is where I need your help to achieve my goal of owning my own bakery! I need your generosity and belief in me to bring my dream to reality. Your contributions will make a direct impact in accomplishing what I need to open the doors to Sarivan Bake Shoppe.

   What is Sarivan Bake Shoppe?? Sarivan Bake Shoppe is a bakery on target to open in December 2016. It will offer only the finest breads, bagels, pastries, muffins, scones, and biscotti, to name a few! It will also offer kid friendly items as well, such as cupcakes, cake pops and holiday themed treats. Gluten free options will also be featured. But I haven't forgotten about your furry loved ones! Fresh baked, all natural dog biscuits will also be offered. It's a win-win for everyone!

 

   My goal is to operate a home-town bakery loved by the community. Giving back is very important to me. Whether it's donating left over product to local food banks and non-profits or offering product to local charities and animal rescues for use as fundraisers, Sarivan Bake Shoppe will become known as a place that supports its community. After all, what is the point in being a small business looking for your neighbor's patronage if you don't give back to those in your community, right?

   Why Belvidere, New Jersey? Belvidere is a beautiful, picturesque town located on the Delaware River. It's historic appearance and small town feel is sure to lure anyone in. Belvidere is a perfect place to start Sarivan Bake Shoppe. As the county seat, Belvidere hosts the county courthouse as well as a beautiful Victorian style community which attracts tourists from all around. It boasts plenty of foot traffic as well as parking for those passing through to stop by and pick up fresh baked pastries on one's way to work or on breaks between cases in court. Another win-win!

       

 

What I Need and What You Get...

   In order to attain my goal I am looking for your help in purchasing the major equipment needed in the daily operation of Sarivan Bake Shoppe. This includes:

  • Double Deck Convection Oven $11,000
  • 3 Bay Sink $750
  • Display Case (qty 2) $1800 each
  • 54" Two Door Refrigerator $1900
  • 20 Quart Commercial Mixer $900
  • Stainless Steel Work Table (qty 2) $200 each
  • Baker's Rack $100
  • Coffee Maker $500
  • Sheet Tray (qty 20) $100 total
  • Storage Shelves (qty 2) $200 each
  • Cash Register $200

   My goal when opening Sarivan Bake Shoppe is to keep my start up costs low and debt even lower. To do that I will utilize my savings (in fairness it's my husband's savings as well, poor guy!) in conjunction with your contributions to fund my start up costs as much as possible in order to eliminate the need for a loan. Because let's be honest, I know opening a business isn't a walk in the park with profits rolling in by the bagful on the first day!

Perks! We all like perks, right?! Especially when you're already helping out a good cause! As a way to say "Thank You" and to keep you fascinated with my campaign, I have developed some fun perks for you. There are coffee mugs, shopping totes, t-shirts, souvenir kits, pastry combo boxes, doggie boxes and more! Just check them out on the right side of this page. There is something for everyone! PLUS, we will be featuring a whole wall in the bakery with our logo surrounded by the names of our gracious donors. We call it our Wall of Fame! After all, words could never truly express my gratitude for your generosity and your confidence in my cause.

  

 

The Impact

   In a world full of big box stores and corporations I am proud to be an independent woman opening a small business in a beautiful community. I believe in offering a product that's made with integrity and natural ingredients (that you can pronounce!). I believe in my talents and my ambition and I know that I can make a positive impact in my community through Sarivan Bake Shoppe. I believe in giving back and always giving people the benefit of the doubt.

   Once Sarivan Bake Shoppe opens it won't take long for it to become an integral part in the lives of the families, businesses and organizations around it. Sarivan Bake Shoppe will be known as a place people can go for delicious food and for support of their events, whether they're seeking food donations for fundraisers or sponsors for an event.

Other Ways You Can Help

   I truly appreciate your interest in my cause and I hope I have convinced you of my sincerity for my love of baking and of my community. Any donation you can give will make an impact. But I understand that not everyone can give monetarily. Please help spread the word of my campaign to open Sarivan Bake Shoppe by utilizing the share tools on this page.

 

Check out our new Facebook page! www.Facebook.com/SarivanBakeShoppe

 

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

story:
The Genesis

My fascination with chocolate started about 4 years ago when I finally indulged in the growing artisanal chocolate craze.  A match at first bite, I could tell this might easily turn into an addiction, so to satisfy my inner health freak, I started making my own.  Basically, I wanted to make certain that I was eating chocolate cooked at temperatures low enough to maintain the health benefits and to ensure that I was getting high integrity, gluten, dairy free chocolate.  Also, I didn't want to be consuming a sweetener other than raw honey on a regular basis.  And my chocolate consumption was definitely veering towards regular. 

Shortly thereafter, I met several Irish Folk who told me about their experiences with the Faerie Forests and Faerie Forts in Ireland.  Wow!  I had never even heard of such phenomena!   But my curiosity was sparked and as magic would have it, the amalgamation of these 3 passions (health, chocolate and faeries), began to  unfold and Faerie Chocolates was born.

What Makes Us Special

Many attributes distinguish Faerie Chocolates from other healthy chocolates on the market. A high ranking favorite is our rich, fudgey taste and texture - a refreshing change from hard snap bars.  This recipe happened purely by accident, and thankfully I've figured out what I did wrong because my faux pas became a delicious hit, and people love it in spite of it being good for them.

Another distinguishing factor, is sweetening the chocolate with raw honey.  In addition to its many health benefits, raw honey is great for the adrenals.  In short, we've taken your sweet fix to a whole new level - power food!  

Our packaging and branding puts our chocolates in a category of their own. After several months of brainstorming, we've finally determined the packaging for our first product line, our Faerie Chocolate Circles.  A unique concept that works in perfect tandem with our branding to express the beauty and intrigue of faerie lore.  I'm confident that this allure will go a long way in encouraging chocolate lovers to choose us amongst the vast competition, and put Faerie Chocolates as a front runner in the 37B health industry,  and in more commercial venues as well.  On a more practical level, our packaging will allow you to eat some now and save some for later without the chocolate flying all over your purse or manbag!

(Caveat - As we're still in the refinement phases of package development, it's not featured in the video.)

Currently, there are six product lines – four dark chocolate and two light chocolate.  Each product line embraces a unique proprietary secret of 'magical' infusions that are fun, healthy and even engage the intellect and imagination.  I'm unable to disclose the proprietary secrets, but our Tooth Faerie line is something  you can look forward to that in addition to being sweet and chewy, actually promotes healthy teeth and gums.  One other faerie I can let fly out of the bag is our Faerie Chocolate BonBon Boxes which will embrace the senses beyond taste and texture to create an almost full sensory experience.  I'm also betting on it being the best chocolate gift you've ever given!

Our Impact

Because of the popularity of chocolate and the recent spike in obesity and other health concerns, Faerie Chocolates are expected to do well in every demographic. I'm delighted to be putting an option on the market to assist all these demographics because none of these health concerns are fun.  

Most specifically, we anticipate popularity in the children and (female) teen markets as both of these demographics have long held a fascination with faerie lore and of course, love chocolate .  Additionally, where children are concerned, our chocolates will prove to be the perfect ‘mom approved’ treats because of their uncompromising healthy ingredients.  Weight conscious teenagers, are going to love that they can have their fill of delicious chocolate and not have to worry about gaining weight.  (Actually, it's fairly easy to assume that everyone will).  This is because all of our ingredients support the adrenals which have so much to do with weight gain and/or loss.   Also, 2 of our product lines,  will prove especially appealing for tweens and teens, engaging their curiosity as they explore their way through the myriad options.

Your Contributions

In the spirit of launching whatever positivity I can into the world, I thank you for your contributions.  They will be greatly appreciated and we'll be using them for product and packaging refinement, sales, marketing and staff.  Then faster than faeries can fly, you are going to get a smorgasbord of delicious, guilt free chocolate that makes you feel great and enhances your life exponentially!

Other Life Lines

If you can't contribute money, but can help by spreading the word to others who can, THANK YOU!  That would be enormously fantastic and greatly appreciated!

Angel Investors

Angel investors will be greatly appreciated!  If you're interested in becoming one and would like to see the business plan, please contact me by clicking the "Ask a Question" button at the top of this page, or by sending me a message on my Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Faerie-Chocolates-1355...
story_txt: The GenesisMy fascination with chocolate started about 4 years ago when I finally indulged in the growing artisanal chocolate craze.  A match at first bite, I could tell this might easily turn into an addiction, so to satisfy my inner health freak, I started making my own.  Basically, I wanted to make certain that I was eating chocolate cooked at temperatures low enough to maintain the health benefits and to ensure that I was getting high integrity, gluten, dairy free chocolate.  Also, I didn't want to be consuming a sweetener other than raw honey on a regular basis.  And my chocolate consumption was definitely veering towards regular. Shortly thereafter, I met several Irish Folk who told me about their experiences with the Faerie Forests and Faerie Forts in Ireland.  Wow!  I had never even heard of such phenomena!   But my curiosity was sparked and as magic would have it, the amalgamation of these 3 passions (health, chocolate and faeries), began to  unfold and Faerie Chocolates was born.What Makes Us SpecialMany attributes distinguish Faerie Chocolates from other healthy chocolates on the market. A high ranking favorite is our rich, fudgey taste and texture - a refreshing change from hard snap bars.  This recipe happened purely by accident, and thankfully I've figured out what I did wrong because my faux pas became a delicious hit, and people love it in spite of it being good for them.Another distinguishing factor, is sweetening the chocolate with raw honey.  In addition to its many health benefits, raw honey is great for the adrenals.  In short, we've taken your sweet fix to a whole new level - power food!  Our packaging and branding puts our chocolates in a category of their own. After several months of brainstorming, we've finally determined the packaging for our first product line, our Faerie Chocolate Circles.  A unique concept that works in perfect tandem with our branding to express the beauty and intrigue of faerie lore.  I'm confident that this allure will go a long way in encouraging chocolate lovers to choose us amongst the vast competition, and put Faerie Chocolates as a front runner in the 37B health industry,  and in more commercial venues as well.  On a more practical level, our packaging will allow you to eat some now and save some for later without the chocolate flying all over your purse or manbag!(Caveat - As we're still in the refinement phases of package development, it's not featured in the video.)Currently, there are six product lines – four dark chocolate and two light chocolate.  Each product line embraces a unique proprietary secret of 'magical' infusions that are fun, healthy and even engage the intellect and imagination.  I'm unable to disclose the proprietary secrets, but our Tooth Faerie line is something  you can look forward to that in addition to being sweet and chewy, actually promotes healthy teeth and gums.  One other faerie I can let fly out of the bag is our Faerie Chocolate BonBon Boxes which will embrace the senses beyond taste and texture to create an almost full sensory experience.  I'm also betting on it being the best chocolate gift you've ever given!Our ImpactBecause of the popularity of chocolate and the recent spike in obesity and other health concerns, Faerie Chocolates are expected to do well in every demographic. I'm delighted to be putting an option on the market to assist all these demographics because none of these health concerns are fun.  Most specifically, we anticipate popularity in the children and (female) teen markets as both of these demographics have long held a fascination with faerie lore and of course, love chocolate .  Additionally, where children are concerned, our chocolates will prove to be the perfect ‘mom approved’ treats because of their uncompromising healthy ingredients.  Weight conscious teenagers, are going to love that they can have their fill of delicious chocolate and not have to worry about gaining weight.  (Actually, it's fairly easy to assume that everyone will).  This is because all of our ingredients support the adrenals which have so much to do with weight gain and/or loss.   Also, 2 of our product lines,  will prove especially appealing for tweens and teens, engaging their curiosity as they explore their way through the myriad options.Your ContributionsIn the spirit of launching whatever positivity I can into the world, I thank you for your contributions.  They will be greatly appreciated and we'll be using them for product and packaging refinement, sales, marketing and staff.  Then faster than faeries can fly, you are going to get a smorgasbord of delicious, guilt free chocolate that makes you feel great and enhances your life exponentially!Other Life LinesIf you can't contribute money, but can help by spreading the word to others who can, THANK YOU!  That would be enormously fantastic and greatly appreciated!Angel InvestorsAngel investors will be greatly appreciated!  If you're interested in becoming one and would like to see the business plan, please contact me by clicking the "Ask a Question" button at the top of this page, or by sending me a message on my Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Faerie-Chocolates-1355...

story:
Good day to you all, 

My name is Steven,  I am a father of 4, a veteran, and a small business owner.  I am no different than anyone else. I, like everyone else, have issues but I know what it takes to succeed. I want to see my kids grow up and live happily, I want to be able to know that through their struggles in life they can at least be financially stable. I want to help, not only my family but those around me so that they can live a life worth living. In order for me to help those people I need to get this business running.

Here is What I Need, and What You Get in Return

I need 2.5 mil. that is for the land, buildings, and equipment. All I am asking is that everyone who can to donate, donate 5 dollars. With that you get 10% discount on everything we have in stock for life on both our store ,and our online store. (We may not be able to ship to specific states due to laws and restrictions. If you have any questions you can email ashlygoodin@direwolfarmory.com, chriscummings@direwolfarmory.com, or stevengoodin@direwolfarmory.com) If you are feeling generous and donate over 100 dollars you get a discount of 15% on everything we have in stock, for life. There are no hidden agendas or catches that aren't being said. We will send you a card that will be made from any excess money we have raised.
Here is What Your Donation Does for Us
Donations add up really fast, and it gives us the means to start this business, get the land, the buildings, equipment and starting production. The sooner we get what we need the better. That also means the more people donate the better off we'll be. In light of that, the quicker we start production the quicker you get your goods for a cheap, affordable price. This business also builds the economy, the more people have good paying jobs the better the economy gets, that means better life for everyone in the U.S.
Here are Some Possible Risks
The biggest risk we take is negativity. Without the support of people who believe in what we are doing, or lack of people who  believe in our cause, we are done for. If we didn't think we could do it we wouldn't ask, but we know that we can achieve our goal so long as we have your assistance. 

You can still help without donating

Some people may not be able to donate and we understand that in some cases that isn't possible, every penny counts, with that being said you can send this link to your friends and family members, all we need is people to donate a small amount, if you can spread the word that would help us greatly the more people who know the better off we are at reaching our goal and starting production. 
Thank you for your help.
